story:
Why You Ask?

I'm 38 years old, and have been practicing yoga for two years.  After being afraid to take the steps, I finally decided to take a leap of faith (while still working a full-time job), and see where the Universe will take me on this new journey.  

I turned to yoga for a few reasons: to learn how to calm the chaos that my job as an Event Planner was bringing me to everyday, to help me cope with a constant of failures from going through a divorce to losing two jobs in less than a year, and to get in shape.   First I did use it as a fitness tool....I was taking 2 classes a day 5-6 days a week.  My mood was elevated, my body was getting into the best shape it ever was in, and my eating habits were improving just by how good I was feeling after each class.  It helped to lower my stress level from work, and when I would go home from taking a class after work, I was able to separate the two and keep the stress at bay.  I discovered that it also helped calm my mind, helped to show me it's okay to let the small stuff just roll off your back and improve my confidence with going through a divorce and dealing with the loss of two jobs in less than a year.  It showed me that whatever you put into the universe to help you create the life you want will come back to you in a positive way.  I love what it has done for my mind and my soul.   


What I have learned on the mat has translated to teaching me life off the mat. I have become much more patient, grateful for everything and everyone around me, kind, and peaceful.  I have been able to become part of an amazing community of people with both diverse and similar thoughts, stories, and backgrounds, all the while having the same connection of our yoga practice.  It, and they, taught me to learn not to judge, taught me to just be me, and know that no matter who I am, I am accepted.  They taught me to see the inner strengths to get through any situation with my head held high, and find strengths I did not know I had.  

I want to complete yoga teacher training to not only deepen my practice, but to help others come to their mat and find what I have found.  I want to help others benefit from their experiences and benefit from their growth.  I want them to experience not only the physical aspects of yoga but the mental and emotional benefits as well that come from taking the time each day to dedicate to yourself on your mat, to practice mindfulness, gratitude and gratefulness, learning to breathe and be still, and experience true inner peace, even if it's just for 1 hour a day.  Yoga is a tool of transformation, and I want to be able to help everyone transform to be their best self.  

I also plan to host yoga events: using my event planning background and combining my love of yoga, I plan to dedicate a portion of those events to my favorite charities and involve the community.  

What I Need & What Do I Get Out of It:

I am blessed to be a part of one of the top 200-Hour programs in the Valley, and after the courses are completed, I will be able to register as Yoga Alliance Certified.

The entire program is a total of $2900:

MOD1 - $900

- APPLICATION FEE

- MATERIALS FEE

- ENROLLMENT FEE

MOD2 - $720

- ASANA MECHANICS

- ROOTS OF YOGA

- ART OF TEACHING

- VITAL ANATOMY

MOD3 - $1,280

- THE MODERN YOGI

- OFF THE MAT

- MENTOR BLOCK 1

- MENTOR BLOCK 2

This certification also allows me to spread my knowledge across the world internationally, not just in the United States, and is a certification that I will have for the rest of my life!  

What Do You Get Out of It?

I will be receiving a comprehensive training in traditions that extend hundreds of thousands of years, and I am so looking forward to sharing that knowledge with you!  Take this opportunity to improve your own wellbeing, or that of your friends and family as well!  Grab a perk or two for yourself, or use as a gift for someone who you think would benefit from a yoga class or a private lesson (or two, or three!).   If you wish to donate without receiving a perk, truly any amount really does go a long way.  If you are not able to donate, please take a minute to share this opportunity with friends or family who might be interested in a class or private lesson via phone, email or even social media.

Thank You!

Thank you all for your support, love and belief in my journey.  It is coming full circle since I took my first yoga class two years ago.  It's never an easy thing to ask for money, but I hope to lean on my supportive community and those around me, and celebrate the generosity that I know exists in the Universe when we take care of each other.

Thank you for helping me fulfill this dream!

Namaste, 

Danica

Thank you for helping me fulfill this dream!

story:
Change is in the Air: A New Chapter for NAAM Yoga AZ 

"WE MUST BE WILLING TO LET GO OF THE LIFE WE HAVE PLANNED, SO AS TO HAVE THE LIFE THAT IS WAITING FOR US."

As most of you know, our intent at Naam Yoga AZ has always been to stay and expand in a year or so in our existing University Drive location. However, the Universe seems to have a different plan for us.  

In all efforts to be transparent, we would like to share with you that in March, our landlord defaulted on his mortgage and our plaza went into foreclosure.  Since then, the plaza has been taken over by a bank.  We have been trying to negotiate a new lease for 2 months and the only option repeatedly offered to us was to sign a 3-year lease with a rent increase of almost 300% or vacate.  We have bought ourselves some time by sending counter proposals, however, we are now out of time and they are unwilling to negotiate further.  

In addition, we can’t find the benefit to staying and paying 300% more rent for a space that is not taken care of in a dying plaza, where we are not allowed to expand at some point. So, that leaves us with the option of moving.   This option, at the moment, also seems impossible because summer is our slowest season and the studio is not in a financial position to accrue the expenses of moving.  This then, leaves us with the final decision of either moving or closing, the latter which we do NOT want to do and has been tearing us up at the thought of it.

In search for a miracle, we have found a wonderful new location in a busy plaza on Higley and University, with a landlord that is willing to work with Naam Yoga AZ and takes our current situation into consideration.  It’s a great opportunity and we feel in our hearts, it is the right move and will bring abundant growth and success.  It will allow us to have multiple classes at the same time and also give Harmonyum Healing and other healing treatments at any time of the day because the treatment rooms are not in the actual studio.  The potential is endless at this new space and will allow us to serve a greater population, bringing even more healing to the residents of Mesa.

So, I am stepping out of my comfort zone…ALL THE WAY…and asking for help.  We are in the business of teaching Yoga.  Yoga is about clearing away whatever is in us that prevents our living in the most full and whole way.  With yoga, we become aware of how & where we are restricted…and my greatest restriction is asking for help.  Therefore, if I am going to continue to teach and guide students, I must practice what I preach and let fear and ego go and trust the Plans the Universe has for me.

So, we am humbly reaching out to you, our beloved community, because we believe this center has made a difference in your lives.  We believe you understand the intention, purpose and passion for Naam Yoga and can perceive the vision for expansion to become a true healing center for the community.

           

WHAT WE NEED AND HOW YOU CAN HELP

In order to relocate, and transform this miracle space into the new community home of our beloved Naam Yoga AZ, we need to raise funds in excess of $21,000. And with the magic we have witnessed within this community, we know just how possible this is.

What is it for, you ask? 

The funds will be used for the cost of moving our current studio and transforming the new studio itself, as well as business licenses, escrow, taxes, insurance, and a small savings to keep things moving smoothly through the first few months of this transition. 

Any and all donation support for the Naam Yoga AZ Relocation will go directly into the project itself.  We will need to build out the new space and make it yoga worthy.

Your contributions will help cover:

  • City fees and requirements
  • Building improvements and alterations: fixtures, build wood cubbies to store the yoga props, customize the reception desk
  • Contractor fees 
  • General construction (installation of wood flooring, walls, paint, etc.)
  • Furniture and necessary furnishings
  • Additional yoga props 

           

            

 

We are also looking to expand our community by adding more teachers to our schedule, a permanent Teacher training program, hire front desk staff, MindBody software for easier check in and scheduling, additional classes, workshops, a children's program, and a full time trauma & recovery program.

Upon moving locations, Naam Yoga AZ will also be renamed NAAM YOGA ARIZONA CENTER FOR THE HEALING ARTS, using the power of the WORD to inform the Universe of our desire to expand and be of service in a greater way, becoming a beacon of God’s Healing Light in the community.  Through this relocation and expansion of Naam Yoga AZ, the tireless efforts of being of service will continue, offering not only a supportive and effective class timetable on site, but we will also endeavor to nourish our already established programs with children, seniors and the trauma/recovery community. With the stability of our new center, we are then able to be of service in our community of Mesa and beyond, building strong out-reach programs for childre,  teens, adults, elderly, physically challenged and more.

          

 

THE IMPACT

Yoga can change your life. We've seen it happen over and over. This practice allows people to develop a stronger sense of presence and realization of their potential. The world needs more Yoga! The world needs more Bliss!   This new space will make it possible for us to invite more people into our community, and to continue expanding the offerings that support our tribe and the affect yoga has on lives, community, and the world.  

Our desire is that Naam Yoga Arizona Center for the Healing Arts will be a Sanctuary of Peace, providing personal guidance, personal transformation, complete well-being, community connection, spiritual and metaphysical education, spiritual development – EMPOWERMENT.  Our wish is that Naam Yoga AZ be a nurturing haven, a place for people to come together for inspiration, creation and service – to raise consciousness toward balance and healing. Balanced and harmonious individuals create stable families and stable families become viable members in their community and society as a whole. It does take a village to change the world!

           

 

WHY? BECAUSE WE ARE ALL IN IT TOGETHER!

In its first 3 years, Naam Yoga AZ became an essential part of the community and we are committed to providing services that otherwise would not exist in Mesa. Even so, we have lots more moving and shaking to do!  The goals that come with having a new home are limitless!

This is a great opportunity to invest in the quality of life and vitality of our community. Every contributor is an essential part of our Naam Yoga AZ family. Your contribution is a hands-on way of helping us raise this barn and our gratitude is immeasurable.  Your contribution will make a difference at Naam Yoga Arizona.  As a contributor, you can know that you will be helping to create transformation, joy, healing and more in in your own and someone else’s life.  At Naam AZ, we truly believe that peace in our World starts with peace inside.  It is our goal to help individuals reach their own goals. Naam Yoga AZ has become an anchor and sanctuary for all in our town, and we believe it is an essential component to keep it alive for all.

           

 

YOUR FRIENDS ARE OUR FRIENDS!

You can be of service in so many ways.

If you cannot make a financial contribution at this time, please support us by SPREADING THE WORD ABOUT OUR CAMPAIGN! Make noise, email your friends and family and send us your prayers for reaching our goal!

Please help us by sharing the link to our campaign on your Facebook or Twitter, email it to some friends who might be interested, send us any ideas or feedback, 

Share with them why this is important to you and why it's good for the Mesa community. The more folks who join us in the raising of this barn, the stronger our community gets!

Indiegogo makes it super easy for you. Just use the share tools on this page to spread the word on all the social platforms as well as via your email database. 

We are so grateful to our community and tribe. We would not be who we are without you. Your contributions will make an unforgettable and incredibly positive impact within so many lives. I thank you for your time and consideration and gratitude in advance for your generosity and dedication.

With Love, Peace and Light always,  

Nicole & the Naam Yoga Arizona Staff
story_txt:
Change is in the Air: A New Chapter for NAAM Yoga AZ "WE MUST BE WILLING TO LET GO OF THE LIFE WE HAVE PLANNED, SO AS TO HAVE THE LIFE THAT IS WAITING FOR US."As most of you know, our intent at Naam Yoga AZ has always been to stay and expand in a year or so in our existing University Drive location. However, the Universe seems to have a different plan for us.  In all efforts to be transparent, we would like to share with you that in March, our landlord defaulted on his mortgage and our plaza went into foreclosure.  Since then, the plaza has been taken over by a bank.  We have been trying to negotiate a new lease for 2 months and the only option repeatedly offered to us was to sign a 3-year lease with a rent increase of almost 300% or vacate.  We have bought ourselves some time by sending counter proposals, however, we are now out of time and they are unwilling to negotiate further.  
In addition, we can’t find the benefit to staying and paying 300% more rent for a space that is not taken care of in a dying plaza, where we are not allowed to expand at some point. So, that leaves us with the option of moving.   This option, at the moment, also seems impossible because summer is our slowest season and the studio is not in a financial position to accrue the expenses of moving.  This then, leaves us with the final decision of either moving or closing, the latter which we do NOT want to do and has been tearing us up at the thought of it.
In search for a miracle, we have found a wonderful new location in a busy plaza on Higley and University, with a landlord that is willing to work with Naam Yoga AZ and takes our current situation into consideration.  It’s a great opportunity and we feel in our hearts, it is the right move and will bring abundant growth and success.  It will allow us to have multiple classes at the same time and also give Harmonyum Healing and other healing treatments at any time of the day because the treatment rooms are not in the actual studio.  The potential is endless at this new space and will allow us to serve a greater population, bringing even more healing to the residents of Mesa.
So, I am stepping out of my comfort zone…ALL THE WAY…and asking for help.  We are in the business of teaching Yoga.  Yoga is about clearing away whatever is in us that prevents our living in the most full and whole way.  With yoga, we become aware of how & where we are restricted…and my greatest restriction is asking for help.  Therefore, if I am going to continue to teach and guide students, I must practice what I preach and let fear and ego go and trust the Plans the Universe has for me.
So, we am humbly reaching out to you, our beloved community, because we believe this center has made a difference in your lives.  We believe you understand the intention, purpose and passion for Naam Yoga and can perceive the vision for expansion to become a true healing center for the community.
           
WHAT WE NEED AND HOW YOU CAN HELP
In order to relocate, and transform this miracle space into the new community home of our beloved Naam Yoga AZ, we need to raise funds in excess of $21,000. And with the magic we have witnessed within this community, we know just how possible this is.
What is it for, you ask?  
The funds will be used for the cost of moving our current studio and transforming the new studio itself, as well as business licenses, escrow, taxes, insurance, and a small savings to keep things moving smoothly through the first few months of this transition. 
Any and all donation support for the Naam Yoga AZ Relocation will go directly into the project itself.  We will need to build out the new space and make it yoga worthy.
Your contributions will help cover:

City fees and requirements
Building improvements and alterations: fixtures, build wood cubbies to store the yoga props, customize the reception desk
Contractor fees 
General construction (installation of wood flooring, walls, paint, etc.)
Furniture and necessary furnishings
Additional yoga props 

           
            
 
We are also looking to expand our community by adding more teachers to our schedule, a permanent Teacher training program, hire front desk staff, MindBody software for easier check in and scheduling, additional classes, workshops, a children's program, and a full time trauma & recovery program.
Upon moving locations, Naam Yoga AZ will also be renamed NAAM YOGA ARIZONA CENTER FOR THE HEALING ARTS, using the power of the WORD to inform the Universe of our desire to expand and be of service in a greater way, becoming a beacon of God’s Healing Light in the community.  Through this relocation and expansion of Naam Yoga AZ, the tireless efforts of being of service will continue, offering not only a supportive and effective class timetable on site, but we will also endeavor to nourish our already established programs with children, seniors and the trauma/recovery community. With the stability of our new center, we are then able to be of service in our community of Mesa and beyond, building strong out-reach programs for childre,  teens, adults, elderly, physically challenged and more.
          
 
THE IMPACT
Yoga can change your life. We've seen it happen over and over. This practice allows people to develop a stronger sense of presence and realization of their potential. The world needs more Yoga! The world needs more Bliss!   This new space will make it possible for us to invite more people into our community, and to continue expanding the offerings that support our tribe and the affect yoga has on lives, community, and the world.  
Our desire is that Naam Yoga Arizona Center for the Healing Arts will be a Sanctuary of Peace, providing personal guidance, personal transformation, complete well-being, community connection, spiritual and metaphysical education, spiritual development – EMPOWERMENT.  Our wish is that Naam Yoga AZ be a nurturing haven, a place for people to come together for inspiration, creation and service – to raise consciousness toward balance and healing. Balanced and harmonious individuals create stable families and stable families become viable members in their community and society as a whole. It does take a village to change the world!
           
 
WHY? BECAUSE WE ARE ALL IN IT TOGETHER!
In its first 3 years, Naam Yoga AZ became an essential part of the community and we are committed to providing services that otherwise would not exist in Mesa. Even so, we have lots more moving and shaking to do!  The goals that come with having a new home are limitless!
This is a great opportunity to invest in the quality of life and vitality of our community. Every contributor is an essential part of our Naam Yoga AZ family. Your contribution is a hands-on way of helping us raise this barn and our gratitude is immeasurable.  Your contribution will make a difference at Naam Yoga Arizona.  As a contributor, you can know that you will be helping to create transformation, joy, healing and more in in your own and someone else’s life.  At Naam AZ, we truly believe that peace in our World starts with peace inside.  It is our goal to help individuals reach their own goals. Naam Yoga AZ has become an anchor and sanctuary for all in our town, and we believe it is an essential component to keep it alive for all.

If you cannot make a financial contribution at this time, please support us by SPREADING THE WORD ABOUT OUR CAMPAIGN! Make noise, email your friends and family and send us your prayers for reaching our goal!
Please help us by sharing the link to our campaign on your Facebook or Twitter, email it to some friends who might be interested, send us any ideas or feedback, 
Share with them why this is important to you and why it's good for the Mesa community. The more folks who join us in the raising of this barn, the stronger our community gets!
Indiegogo makes it super easy for you. Just use the share tools on this page to spread the word on all the social platforms as well as via your email database. 
We are so grateful to our community and tribe. We would not be who we are without you. Your contributions will make an unforgettable and incredibly positive impact within so many lives. I thank you for your time and consideration and gratitude in advance for your generosity and dedication.
With Love, Peace and Light always,  
Nicole & the Naam Yoga Arizona Staff

story:
By donating to this campaign...

  • You help support our mission of ending stigma and raising awareness of mental health and suicide prevention
  • You will also help fund the first ever GSD Dance Walk
  • You help us connect people in need of mental health services to professionals who can help
  • You get awesome thank-you gifts

 

What We Need

Total Start Up Costs: $1500

  • Website and domain for one year
  • Permits, supplies (water, snacks, first aid) for the walk
  • Promotional materials (T-shirts from Wove Co, flyers, banners, etc)
  • Sound equipment

What you get

When you donate, you get one of a kind incentives. Here are a few:

  • Donate $25 - Receive a badly drawn portrait from Laura
  • Donate $50 - Any song of your choice sung by Laura on the GSD Podcast
  • Donate $100 - Receive a GSD Official taco art original
  • Donate $200 - Laura will do a Tina Belcher Dance to the song of your choice, posted on GSD's Facebook
  • Donate $500 - Laura will wear a t-shirt with your face on it for 48 hours (photo and video documented)
 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Volunteer for the walk (registration, handing out water, sunblock, etc)
  • Share this campaign with family and friends
  • If you are a business looking to sponsor the event, please contact us directly

story:
How this project got started

My name is Yacoba Asare-Konadu. But you can call me Cobi!

After working in the fast-paced world of New York's fashion scene for a number of years, I felt a strong calling to shift my life towards a healthier, stronger and more balanced state of being. My journey in my own wellness began with teaching yoga, then evolving into a deeper interest in body work and the eventual discovery of Jin Shin Jyutsu: A Japanese Healing Art that involves releasing tension in the body through light touch.

While one-to-one services are at the heart of my work and craft, my true desire is to be able to deliver the invaluable knowledge of wellness and self-care far beyond my own reach. This is where the idea of The Wellness Toolkit was born: A simple website, rich with useful information and actionable steps you can take to empower your own daily self-care and well being. Tools for life! 

What Will The Wellness Toolkit Do?:

  • Quick Tips: Provide access to actionable information that can help someone feel better in their bodies, immediately
  • Affordable Resource: Provide an affordable at-home solution to self-care practices for people who do not have always have a physical studio, practitioner or educational resource nearby
  • Simple Start: Provide practical, easy-to-follow guidance on how to take the first tangible steps to a healthier and more fulfilling life

How we will bring The Wellness Toolkit to life:

We are in need of funds to help pay for production costs of what will be my most ambitious project yet: a completely new and customized website, full of great content to select from including but not limited to: downloadable PDF’s, video tutorials, audible guided meditations, courses and more.

 

Phase 1 of the project:

Beautiful and cohesively designed downloadable PDF’s as content supplies including but not limited to:

  • Knowledge around our body’s nervous system, energy pathways and how they relate to our daily attitudes and behaviors
  • Affirmations and helpful daily guidances to keep your self-care practice in maintenance and in fluid motion
  • 3-5 week long courses designed to help you transform the way you feel in your body from small changes in your food intake to how you wake up each morning and ways for you to create new energy.

Phase 2 of the project:

Professionally produced video tutorials and high quality audio-based guides including but not limited to:

  • Daily Meditation Practices
  • Easy to follow classes that you can take in the privacy and convenience of your own home
  • Recipes and Rituals: A series of videos and recipes that places hydration, nourishment and positive energy at the center of your daily practice

How the funds will be used:

10,000 USD broken down as follows:

  • 5,000 - Video production - this will go to the video producers of shooting and editing our first batch of videos including Jin Shin Jyutsu introductions, tutorials, meditation, yoga, recipes, rituals, interviews, vlogs varying from 3-60 minute increments and more.
     
  • 2,000 - Website development & Responsive Mobile Design - We will emphasize a highly user-friendly digital experience that will be perfect for both desktop and mobile experiences. The point of The Wellness Toolkit is to provide immediacy and we need to be able to make sure folks can receive this content, even while they’re on the go!
     
  • 2,000 - Marketing: Our marketing and distribution campaign will work largely off of social media and we’ll need to create platform specific content, including but not limited to Facebook Live Campaigns, Sponsored Ads on Instagram, Sponsored Ads on YouTube as well as a budget for limited merchandise and production costs for in-person events.
     
  • 1,000 - Design: So much of the success of the Wellness Toolkit will be attributed to how we can transform complex information into an experience that feels inviting, accessible, easy-to-use and practical for ALL bodies. I’ll need to bring on someone who understands the concept and mission to help me translate what I know how to do with my physical practice into a beautiful digital experience.
     
  • Priority of funds will go on creating the product (the videos and web development).

The Impact

Your contribution to this project will help so many people have access to tools, in addition to its inevitable effect on bringing wellness to areas of need:

  • Empowering people to make positive decisions for their own self-care and well being
  • Designing a relevant and contemporary look for ancient methods of healing
  • Reaching a larger audience than the limitations of a singular network
  • Providing disarming, easy-to-follow guidance to those who have been dissuaded from wellness 'trends'
  • Creating opportunities for people to feel their best in their bodies, immediately

The importance in designing information for EVERY body:

The picture of contemporary wellness practices does not always accurately reflect the uniqueness of all bodies and beings. The Wellness Toolkit will be designed in such a way that addresses all ages, all shapes and sizes, all gender presentations, identities and origins. 

The Wellness Toolkit will invite people of all experiences to begin exploring the root cause of some of their deepest ailments and provide them with informative, actionable tools to help themselves feel their best in their bodies.

Risks & Challenges

We view our biggest risks and challenges to be in the following areas:

  • Lack of belief in someone being able to take their health into their own hands, or lack of belief that this toolkit is made for them
  • The inability to pay the producers of the content
  • No awareness or ability to reach the people who need this toolkit the most

How we can mitigate these challenges:

  • We will prioritize designing content that conveys self-care being accessible by people of all different experiences vs. a one-dimensional view of a healthy body
  • We will be creating paid packages and abilities to receive 1:1 personalized consultations to help cover costs on a continuing basis in addition to hosting monthly events, merchandise sale and sponsored partnerships.
  • We will be working closely with a dedicated marketing and advertising team to ensure that the content is being distributed in smart, strategic and sensible ways.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, it's ok! 

  • Share this with your friends and family, spread the word out about The Wellness Toolkit
  • Send this personally to people you know would be interested in contributing to this
  • Keep The Wellness Toolkit in your thoughts and in your meditations :)

With much love and gratitude, 

Cobi

Cobi

story:
About us

My name is Jane Parker and I am the founder of Radiance Natural Health. My interest in nutrition started 10 years ago and I have been practicing as a nutritional therapist for 5 years. I am a chef and have a passion for cooking and the power of food for health and well being. I have proved this power through my own health journey.

Our vision with Radiance is to bring together the power of different natural ways of healing under one roof, nutrition, yoga and natural healing therapies. We want to make it affordable and fun and create a flourishing health community where we can all support each other. We want to create a charity that we can grow to help people live in good health and show them how to cook healthy affordable (in both time and money!) meals to sustain optimum health. But also the importance of supporting food choices with life enhancing ways of feeling healthy and happy and balanced through yoga, mindfulness, meditation and simple grounding techniques.

By supporting us and getting involved you can be part of a new paradigm of health as we believe the future of health care lies in natural medicine and nurturing of ourselves through natural therapies, yoga and simple things like connecting with nature. We believe this is much needed in this world of confusion and rising poor health.

We plan to offer a full range of treatments and therapies to support your whole body and mind, with nutrition at the forefront.

  • Nutritional therapy
  • Cookery workshops
  • Yoga studio
  • Massage therapies
  • Reiki
  • Shiatsu
  • Film nights
  • Aromatherapy and flower essence workshops
  • Meditation and mindfulness
  • Singing workshops

All of this in the most stunning location surrounded by 25 acres of unspoiled countryside, tranquility and nature.

How you can help

We are looking for funds to further develop our beautiful Cornish retreat. We have worked tirelessly for the past five years to build our business to this point and now want to take it to a new level with our health offering and by creating a not for profit charity status. With your help and support:

We would like to refurbish some space to create the nutrition clinic and a treatment room which will also house our infrared sauna. Both rooms need some tender loving care to restore them. Our existing yoga studio also requires some refurbishment and new equipment........

We'd also like to get funding to purchase a commercial juicer to support both our planned detox events and our residential retreats.

Also we'd like to create flexibility in our accommodation to make retreats and residential events more affordable by purchasing a few additional single beds to turn three of our huge rooms into sharing rooms for singles and small groups.

WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

Purchase one of our packages or make a donation

If you can’t contribute financially: spread the word + share on your social channels!

Visit our facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/Radiance-Natural-Health-294785504705880/

What the funding is needed for in more detail:

We have two beautiful rooms to re furbish into treatment rooms. One will be a clinic for nutritional therapy and other talking therapies. This requires some building work as well as carpets, decorating, curtains and furniture. This large room is to be partitioned into two rooms and the smaller will house an infrared sauna. 

The other treatment room needs to be carpeted and decorated and we hope to install infrared heating panels so that it is warm for our therapy treatments. We also want to fund a massage table and simple sound system.

Our yoga studio requires some refurbishment and up grading. We would really love to put a wood burner in here and also hope to fund some new equipment (mediation cushions, bolsters, rugs, mats, straps and blocks). We also need new curtains and a screen for showing films.

We hope to raise additional funding for a commercial juicer to support our detox programs and for retreats and other events we will be holding.

The purchase of 4 single beds to increase the number of guests we can accommodate.

Our target if we reach it also includes a marketing budget for PR and advertising and finally funding to improve car parking facilities and the drive.

If we don't reach our entire goal any funding will go first towards the refurbishment of the two therapy rooms so we are able to offer therapies in professional surroundings.

On completion of the project and creation of Radiance we will then apply for charitable status for which we also need your help to fund.

 

Our Impact

We think this type of facility is much needed and by making the workshops affordable and offering therapies like yoga and meditation we can help as many people as possible to improve their health and happiness. We are also going to offer payment schemes for retreats and nutritional therapy so that those who can't afford it can spread the costs.

We believe that lifestyle medicine is the future and want to grow a flourishing health community both in the local area and through our retreats to educate and empower people to take responsibility for their own health. Education in the area of food choices and to improve health is much needed as there is too much uninformed information out there. We want to provide sensible up to the minute help for those struggling with a myriad of health concerns whilst taking the individual into account...we are all different and have varying needs.

 

Help us to spread the word!

Help us reach more people, faster!

Please share this with as many people as possible

Help us realise our dream of making this into a charity to help as many as possible

We are so grateful for any help, thank you so much

With love, Jane and all the team at Radiance xx

With your help and support:
We would like to refurbish some space to create the nutrition clinic and a treatment room which will also house our infrared sauna. Both rooms need some tender loving care to restore them. Our existing yoga studio also requires some refurbishment and new equipment........
We'd also like to get funding to purchase a commercial juicer to support both our planned detox events and our residential retreats.
Also we'd like to create flexibility in our accommodation to make retreats and residential events more affordable by purchasing a few additional single beds to turn three of our huge rooms into sharing rooms for singles and small groups.

WAYS YOU CAN HELP:
Purchase one of our packages or make a donation
If you can’t contribute financially: spread the word + share on your social channels!
Visit our facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/Radiance-Natural-Health-294785504705880/
What the funding is needed for in more detail:
We have two beautiful rooms to re furbish into treatment rooms. One will be a clinic for nutritional therapy and other talking therapies. This requires some building work as well as carpets, decorating, curtains and furniture. This large room is to be partitioned into two rooms and the smaller will house an infrared sauna. 
The other treatment room needs to be carpeted and decorated and we hope to install infrared heating panels so that it is warm for our therapy treatments. We also want to fund a massage table and simple sound system.
Our yoga studio requires some refurbishment and up grading. We would really love to put a wood burner in here and also hope to fund some new equipment (mediation cushions, bolsters, rugs, mats, straps and blocks). We also need new curtains and a screen for showing films.

We hope to raise additional funding for a commercial juicer to support our detox programs and for retreats and other events we will be holding.
The purchase of 4 single beds to increase the number of guests we can accommodate.
Our target if we reach it also includes a marketing budget for PR and advertising and finally funding to improve car parking facilities and the drive.
If we don't reach our entire goal any funding will go first towards the refurbishment of the two therapy rooms so we are able to offer therapies in professional surroundings.
On completion of the project and creation of Radiance we will then apply for charitable status for which we also need your help to fund.
 

Our Impact
We think this type of facility is much needed and by making the workshops affordable and offering therapies like yoga and meditation we can help as many people as possible to improve their health and happiness. We are also going to offer payment schemes for retreats and nutritional therapy so that those who can't afford it can spread the costs.
We believe that lifestyle medicine is the future and want to grow a flourishing health community both in the local area and through our retreats to educate and empower people to take responsibility for their own health. Education in the area of food choices and to improve health is much needed as there is too much uninformed information out there. We want to provide sensible up to the minute help for those struggling with a myriad of health concerns whilst taking the individual into account...we are all different and have varying needs.


 
Help us to spread the word!Help us reach more people, faster!
Please share this with as many people as possible
Help us realise our dream of making this into a charity to help as many as possible
We are so grateful for any help, thank you so much
With love, Jane and all the team at Radiance xx

story:
What is Sanctuary In the City?

Sanctuary in the City was founded by six, women of color community leaders who saw the need for an accessible, safe, and affirming space for individuals and families of color to gather locally to promote transformation on personal, social, community, professional, and environmental levels. Growing and healing from race-based trauma through focus on the whole self, for all persons of color, is the primary purpose of this intentionally-created space. The Sanctuary in the City will offer workshops, marketplaces, conferences, and other events to foster six key pillars:

 

Mind-Body Wellness

Empowerment

Preservation

Entrepreneurship

Arts & Culture

Personal Development & Knowledge

Community

What Are You Going To Do With the Money?

Our goal is to create accessible programming that meets the needs of our community.  We aim to eliminate barriers like unaffordable class pricing and space rental fees. Cooperative economics and authentic collaboration are principles that are a part of who we are. Through intentional work and self determination we are focused on providing services, classes  and community space through a sustainable sliding scale which includes free and donation based offerings. At this time, the housing climate in Charlotte is unstable. Neighborhoods are being uprooted and communities are being displaced. We are on a place of uncertainty about the best location to put down roots. At this time we are looking to be able to host offerings at varied locations throughout the Charlotte metro area. Your participation and support through tax deductible donations will support our ability to provide:

 

Financial workshops

Pop-up meditation tents

Health and wellness workshops

Pop up yoga offerings

Home improvement workshops

Hand delivering encouraging notes and snacks  to people in need

Home buying educational workshops (red-lining, mortgage lending)

Entrepreneurship Training and Education

Community Building Events

Political and Social Advocacy

Story Circles

We are seeking $75,000 to cover the projected budget for the startup and first year expenses of this project. This budget includes the cost of acquiring a space, maintaining utilities, funding programming goals and acquiring equipment. 

What is this all about?

The solutions we seek do not exist. We have so many resources and need space to curate ways to share, build, and reimagine the narratives around our wellness. We know that we no longer need to depend on other people to solve anything for our community.

 

Our group has been meeting in different capacities for over one year to slowly build our vision, align our talents, and formulate a plan of action to bring regular, accessible programming to the City of Charlotte. Our vision is tied to the collective healing that can brings our community together to find new patterns to heal old traumas.

Healing will occur in the community spaces we create, when we connect to our individual humanity, honor and celebrate the strength that we possess and cultivate authentic community offerings.

 

Giving financially is not the only way YOU can help:

Please help us spread the word about the work being done here in our city of Charlotte. Use your social media and the share tools here to share our mission with your friends, families and communities.

story:
hello!

  • I am a licensed master social worker & bodyworker (LLMSW-LMT) committed to healing justice in the healing arts. There is a critical gap in what is offered to social work versus bodywork clients, a gap I address in: my current sliding-scale therapy pop-up for womxn & my enrollment at Build Institute, where I am engaged as a social entrepreneur.
  • I discovered iRest during a mentorship in my MSW program, and have engaged in the study and application of iRest for the past year: witnessing beautiful, accessible + sustainable (aka: radical) healing in my clients. Simply put, iRest is radically restorative. Becoming an iRest teacher will allow me to offer sessions to womxn at facilities in Detroit, especially in the under-served (domestic violence agencies, homeless shelters, psychiatric units + incarceration, etc.) social services sector.
  • Contributors help bring healing to womxn & PTSD in Detroit!

needs + perks

  • needs: $1900 covers the cost of my iRest Level 1 teacher-training this FEBRUARY
  • perks: I offer a guided meditation, distance Reiki healing, & individual + group yoga nidra sessions in exchange <3 (+space to simply be *abundance AF*)

story:
Hello and many blessing to all of you contributors and thank you for reading our project!

This space has been used for guiding souls on one to one and groups in vastly different ways; emotionally, spiritually and even physically in their journey to find peace. We created a space for silent retreats for healers, teachers, students, business entrepreneurs, office workers, artists, musicians, writers. Really anyone of any age is welcome.

Unfortunately we have been hit by 3 flash flood in 2 months which destroyed most of the building structures includes bridge, meditation space, the two bungalows we had built for the students and ground floor of the main area and kitchen. 

I am not giving up of what I have to share to others.  We wish to start rebuilding and make it weather proof adaptable to all seasons we experienced for the past few years here. 

Below are some pictures taken randomly around the property after the flood.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We will need to build a new roof for my five bungalows, change the bamboo structure and elevate the bungalows higher from the ground so in the eventuality of another flood the water will be flowing under. We will treat the bamboo for the weather wearing and also purchase new table and chairs. We calculated with the cost of the labour, electricity water and rent for the next 10 months a budget of 10 000 usd.

It will be the unique space to get too with a river to cross and a jungle surrounding the property. It will also be a non digital place with limited coverage here so busy city life worker will find peace all along.

In the event of not reaching the entire amount desired, the money will be used to renovate what we can with it.

For all contribution I will offer my services, soul healing, online guided meditation, and online  retreat, I also make my own organic herbal tea from the plants we have here in our land.

How we will spend the fund raised

 

 

 

Spending per months 

 

Who I am and what I do

Since I was young, I always felt that I was born for a bigger purpose in life. At that time, I still wasn’t sure what it was. I could only dream about my life purpose. Maybe it was only an illusion!  The life I had in the corporate world and my unhappy household didn’t serve the calling that I have always felt. It didn't matter how successful I might have been in my work, family and social life.  Nothing seemed to fulfil me. So the search began. I turned down jobs and overruled my family to pursue what we call spirituality!

Leading a conscious, healthy lifestyle is important to me.  I never underestimate the impact that the psyche can have on a person's physical well-being. If we're going to get through this life in one piece, we need to take care of ourselves beyond the typical nutrition and exercise. I found the Light of internal peace and clarity. 

 I believe that we can always bounce back from what knocks us down and come back and be  stronger than before. We are capable of reprogramming our mind in the ways we see, feel, listen and get to our inner truth.

I have learned to live harmonically between our physical nature and in the myths of the unseen world with my love, light and kindness.

 

This coffee shop will be one stop for local people and travellers to practice mindfulness, meditation, learning and sharing ideas. 

So I will adapt and re-orientate my activity for who is already here. I want to offer the Thai people, expats and anyone really, a place to be free to talk, meditate and escape from the busy city life to reconnect with the mother earth and themselves.

How your contribution will help

In this challenging time we need to become more human than ever, I am seeing everyday the technology taking over our lives. By creating the space for you and us together we connect again organically with the nature and the universe which create the balance between the two world ( the Tech and the Human ). I am a healer and a guide for those who come to me in their journey of finding peace within. Your contribution will allow me to continue the journey and share my understanding and knowledge for a more mindful society.     

I held a space for silent retreats in the past for healers, teachers, students, business entrepreneurs, office workers, artists, musicians, writers, and anyone, of any age, who seek to master their life and their professions.

Some feedback from my students who came to stay at my space ;

  • “I don't know how to describe this, but all I can say she is definitely a healer. I've spent money on many psychologists and doctors, but what she was able to do in just a day trumps all of that. Truly a remarkable experience.” Karyn

  • “Naiyana...is a piece of heaven. You can feel the beautiful energy...Her warmth, spirit and natural healing ability made this one of the most meaningful weeks in my life. ..Forever grateful. Love u Naiyana for giving me your selfless time and energy and showing me how to heal.” Yusuf

Why helping me to run this place ?

One of the main challenge is the maintenance of the property. I would  like to keep every structure as natural as possible to create sustainable space without the use of permanent material which would become waste to the land. I use bamboo and it doesn't last long due to my limited resources to treat the material. The funds will allow me to treat the bamboo so it can last longer by protecting it from the weather, with treatment the bamboo could last for up to 5 years.

I have created this living style to set an example to all who come to me. I have been teaching/guiding for more than 5 years so I know the strengths and weaknesses of the bamboo structure and the challenges to keep the place running. I saw how the rain and the wind get in and how close the bush fire can get, and now I saw the river flooded.... I can say I have seen it all from all directions.

I will build a better roof and foundation for all bungalows and the sala. I will lift the floor higher to let the water from the river run its course under and safely.

Living among the nature is also believing in the force of nature, I will not be able to prevent all natural disasters 100 per cents but we can prepare and protect the best we can....

With love and kindness....

Please pass it on !

You can make donation or purchase my services or just spread the word Thank you all!

story:
Lazy Cat Cafe's BIG MOVE

Hi, I’m Dave Robb. Many of you that find yourselves here will already know me from the Lazy Cat Cafe.

For 18 months, we have worked hard to offer a unique and relaxing experience in the heart of Preston and from the reviews, we have been going from strength to strength:

  • 163 5* trip advisor reviews 
  • Many reviews and recommendation on FB
  • Over 150 reviews on Google

 

I’m here today as after the success, the laughter and the countless cat cuddles, we need to move to NEW premises. Our current lease has run out and planned building work means we cannot stay. Having identified and provisionally agreed new premises on Lancaster Road in Preston City centre, we need your help to get us there!

 

 

The story so far...

We really have made a much loved and special place in Preston for people to come together and interact with our beautiful cats; whether playing, cuddling, unwinding, or just talking with staff about all things cats and many things not cat! With people coming from Preston, Blackpool, Lancaster and as far away as Norway, Canada and Bermuda! We want to keep this going and excitedly look to make the experience even better at our new premises. 

 

The community has been amazing so as part of the move, we want to deliver on some of the areas you have been asking us for to include: 

  • Afternoon tea and light bites.
  • Focused events, whether tabletop gaming nights, singles nights, just late nights! 
  • We are also just starting to explore some possibilities around group therapy and wellbeing sessions.  
  • More cats!

 

The Cat Cafe means so much to myself and to so many people in the local area, with many citing it as the best place in Preston! (thank you). We need your help to stay in Preston and open at a new location, and we would like as many of you as possible to take this opportunity to get involved.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are already moving forward, working on the Big Move and found suitable premises on Lancaster Road and agreed terms. These premises will give us the space to expand the existing cafe and offer improve facilities for the Cats and visitors alike.

The short version of the sums!

  • Securing New premises – £10,000  (includes first 3 months business rates)
  • Improvements and fittings: £4,000
  • Council approvals - £1,000

 

We are offering prepaid cat sessions along with a number of unique perks to both raise the funds to secure the new premises along with expanding into some exciting areas.

Even more excitingly, if we over achieve our goal:

  • We would like to further enrich the environment with new toys and furniture.
  • Maybe even a few new cats!
  • Additional Kitchen equipment and more!
  • Development of the booking system to allow more flexible bookings and improved easier experience (flexible times, flexible booking length)
  • Improved security - shutters for the premises. 

 

The additional space will also allow us to start to offer food, with a focus on offering a mixed menu to include Vegan and Gluten Free options. Importantly and initially offering afternoon tea with scones, small cake bites and light bites.

As well as our great house blend coffee and the exceptionally well received hot chocolate, we would like to offer a huge range of tea and expand the coffee shop to create a peaceful escape to the hustle and bustle of modern life.

Oh... and did we mention new addition to the cat team??

So, you know what we need, and our plans, can you help us get there?

 

What your input means

Without the trust and support of the public and community at large, we couldn’t do this. Your support will enable the continued success of Preston's own Cat Cafe.

 

Risks & Challenges

In re-opening we have had a number of challenges, many of which we have already addressed; however we want to take our last year and a half’s experience and use this to create a ‘sanctuary’ in the heart of Preston.

This unique experience puts us in a great position to understand the challenges and mitigate many risks, however there are still areas we can't effectively manage:

  • Financially securing the new premises.
  • The time it takes to settle the cats into their new home.

 

With our existing experience and your support we know we can address these key points. Not to mention the fact we have 9 lives!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We really do have an amazing community, and couldnt have achieved what we have so far without you. We would ask you all out there to really help us spread the word. If you could Promote, Like, Share, just really make some noise about our campaign, it would be invaluable to us all here at the Cafe. #thebigmove

Additionally, if you have any ideas, or feedback for us, please get in touch! 

We hope you are as excited as we are!

Thanks for reading, sharing and contributing.

Dave, Kathy and the Lazy Cat Cafe Team.

Additionally, if you have any ideas, or feedback for us, please get in touch! 
We hope you are as excited as we are!
Thanks for reading, sharing and contributing.
Dave, Kathy and the Lazy Cat Cafe Team.

story:
Can you help this Armenian family?

 

The 44-day war just a few months ago left the Hovhannisyan family torn apart. Their home is now in the "territory of Azerbaijan" and their father, a serviceman in the Army is missing in action, presumed dead. 

Haykaz Hovhannisyan, 35 years old. A serviceman in the Armed Forces of Armenia.

He left behind his wife and 3 children. Milena(12), Anush(9) and Raffi(4).

The family forcibly removed from their home, now temporarily living in a relative's village home in Armenia.

The owed salary for wages since October have not and will not be paid. The family is struggling with expenses on a daily basis. Currently relatives have been providing some winter clothes and food, despite the troubled economy.

 

 

The Hovhannisyan Family

Milena, 12 years old. Anush, 9 years old.  Raffi, 4 years old.

 

Management and Funds

My name is Alexander Azizian and I have moved from Los Angeles, CA to Yerevan, Armenia for almost 9 years now. Since then I have been practicing fencing and teaching English. 

I have worked on two campaigns on this same website, you can check my social media profile and these projects:

*Fixing A Fencing School / *Troubled Family

Also some more credibility;

*Ranked Fencer for Armenia

*Owner of a FoodTruck business

These are clickable links, you can get insight on my transparency. I do not get any salary or commission from any of this. 

 

Why help here and now?

When the war started I was outside of Armenia. I couldn't find a reliable group that would ensure my donation didn't get lost and/or go to waste. I could only send under 100$ and I didn't want to just give it to the big companies. I want to help at least one family from the war, so I eventually gave it to the big companies.  I was very upset when I learned my donation did not reach any of the families. I promised when I returned to Armenia I would see to it personally that I can help some families.

Every dollar is going to this family. I am not taking any commission or salary from this. I will also be paying the bank transfer fees and other fees. This platform charges 5% of the total amount. So if we raise 1000$, the family will get 950$. 

The exchange rate from USD to AMD is at a record high, 525 drams for 1 dollar. When I arrived 9 years ago it was 390. Bread, eggs and milk average to 500 drams each. Imagine how far every dollar can support this family. If we reach our goal the extra funds will continue to support the family. Again, I don't take anything from this. 100% of the funds will go to the Hovhannisyan family.

 

Thank you so much for your support and prayers for the Hovhannisyan family.

story:
Life's True Casserole - Page 86

GOAL:

To help 5,000 people MAKE A DATE WITH THEIR SOUL this Valentine's Day 2017 by getting the Pretty Poems to Ponder book in as many needful hands as possible. 
To do this we need your assistance please.

We all know someone who needs a little more LOVE and LIGHT in their lives, especially around Valentine's Day.  Let us pay it forward by becoming Archangel Sponsors ourselves.  By purchasing Pretty Poems to Ponder in bulk we are able to share more sunshine and smiles.  How many people can you help this holiday season?  Let's be the GOOD we wish to see in the world.

Shangri-La - Page 134

Pretty Poems to Ponder, is a blessed book composed from channeling poetry from Archangel Raphael.  Whether you believe in Angels or not doesn’t really matter.  What matters is that you found this campaign for a reason…and that reason is to help yourself MAKE A DATE WITH YOUR SOUL.


Already Within - Page 5

Now is the time.  This is the moment!  The best gift one can receive is the gift of INSPIRATION.  Pretty Poems to Ponder is MOJO for your SOUL.  Buy Pretty Poems to Ponder now for yourself and those in need!  It makes a great gift for Valentine's Day...or anytime of the year!  Both women and men, whether young or old, absolutely LOVE IT!  It's TRUE we can make the WORLD a BETTER place.  Take action now!

The more books you buy the more money you save!  Share more LOVE & LIGHT with the world.  Give the gift of INSPIRATION for someone's birthday, VALENTINE'S DAY, or just a stranger in need!  Become a bulk book buyer or Archangel Sponsor today and save BIG while helping others! 

Magnetic Me - Page 93
 

Who is MOJO?

Melissa Jo Hunter, a.k.a. MOJO is an International Spokes Model, Reality TV Star and Published Poet originally from Indianapolis, Indiana now living in Hollywood.


L.A. Times Festival of Books - Los Angeles, CA

  • This is MOJO's third campaign here on Indie Go Go.  You can see she is a gal who gets things done, no matter what obstacles stand in her way.  When the WHY is big enough the HOW takes care of itself.
  • In her first Pretty Poems to Ponder Book Campaign MOJO raised $1,025 by 7 backers to get the book formatted, edited, published and printed. 
  • In her second campaign MOJO raised $770 by 9 backers to help with shipping and handling of book submissions, marketing and work the audio book and website.
  • This third campaign is of the utmost importance to help get the finished product, the Pretty Poems to Ponder book into the hands who need it before it's too late.
  • Contributors will not only be helping MOJO follow her passion of sharing her lessons of love and light with the world but also getting a perfect inspirational poetry book into the hands of your loved ones and needful.

You can help make the world a better place!
Make a Date With Your Soul now!


What We Need & What You Get

It's not about the money goal... it's about helping 5,000 people.

  • I crunched the numbers to get the price of the book as low as it could go.  If you kindly consider becoming an Archangel Sponsor I will personally be able to deliver the books to local organizations in need.
  • I have set aside my goals of creating a beautiful website, audio book, creating an LLC, traveling on a book tour, creating inspirational card decks and dvds for now... because I know what matters most is getting these inspirational poems into the hands of those who need them. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you already "found your MOJO"/already have a Pretty Poems to Ponder book or just can't financially contribute at this time, please take action another way by:

  • Sharing this campaign link  on your social media sites and websites.
    Instagram - Facebook - Snap Chat - Periscope - Twitter - and all the other cool ones!
    Use this link:  https://igg.me/at/prettypoems
  • Let's reach our goal of helping 5,000 people MAKE A DATE WITH THEIR SOUL this Valentine's Day 2017 by receiving an Autographed & Personalized copy of Pretty Poems to Ponder donated by YOU!
  • If you have any media connections whether tv, youtube, bloggers, press, etc. we would love any referrals or shout outs please.
  • Kindly just click on the Indie Go Go share tools above to spread the LOVE.

Thank you in advance and may all of the Archangels bless you in ways more powerful than perpetuity.  Namaste (the God in me honors and cherishes the God in you!) mwah.

xoxo
MOJO

Angel Protection Prayer - Page 12

story:
Who We Are

Holistic Healing on Wheels, LLC (HHOW) is a family-owned spa that provides alternative therapy to the national community. We serve as a mobile outlet of holistic spa treatments that bring our services directly to those in need. Holistic Healing on Wheels LLC promotes the facilitation and education of alternative healing practices for a healthier mankind. 

HHOW LLC was created to provide holistic healing for the mind, body, and spirit. Our mobile facility is a sensory experience that will lead you on a journey to revitalization, rejuvenation, and restoration. We desire a life of purpose, clarity, and balance for our clients that reflect in the services we offer. Services include acupuncture, reiki, massage therapy, facials, addiction and mental health treatments.  These services provide direct benefits to under-served communities with the hope of increasing health awareness within the national community. 

Overall, HHOW LLC is dedicated to lowering the rates of healthcare disparities by facilitating access to wellness services and increasing the number of citizens leading longer and healthier lives across the nation. We use natural products, essential oils, pure potions, organic botanicals, cruelty-free, and chemical-free products. We partner with companies that engage in sustainable harvesting practices because we are invested in maintaining a healthier earth, as well as sustaining healthier individuals.  Holistic Healing on Wheels, LLC brings an experience like no other, all centered in a luxurious mobile facility. Join us on this holistic healing journey. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need funding support for pre-opening and first-year operational expenses. These expenses include permit fees, NY publication requirements, commercial registrations, the conversion of the bus/RV we will be using for our mobile unit, payroll assistance, and initial vendor inventory. In order to bring state of the art luxury spa services to the nation, we need a unique facility to provide these spectacular services along with equally qualified and valuable staff.
  • As a supporter, you will receive our sincere gratitude, recognition, merchandise, and even complimentary spa services and treatments once we are up and running!
  • If you are a business interested in supporting our campaign we are open to developing affiliate programs.
  • Investors we are open to negotiating equity. 
  • This is an ongoing initiative.  If we do not reach our goals in the Indiegogo time frame all funds raised will go towards launching the renovation process.

The Impact

If you are considering supporting us in our fundraising efforts these are a few things you will be helping to make happen:

  • Affordable health services for under-served communities.
  • A luxury spa experience coming directly to your city, neighborhood, or block.
  • An opportunity for Americans to live longer, healthier lives by having a tangible option in alternative healthcare.
  • Wellness of mind, body, and spirit to all who seek it.
  • Increase health awareness on a national level.
  • Provide a national service with the possibility of expansion to serve our international community as well.  

The Challenge

The health and wellness spa industry is growing and becoming increasingly competitive. There are mobile spas developing across the nation. You might ask "how do we differ from any other mobile spa company out there?" Well, we not only come to you but, we bring the entire facility to you. There is no home set up to invade your privacy, no outdoor set up that can change with the weather, no additional travel or set up fees.  Additionally, we offer a wheelchair accessible facility.  All you have to do is get on the bus and enter into a world of relaxation, pampering, and rejuvenation. 

Let's Feel the Love

While we would love to receive your financial support we understand not everyone is able to give from their wallet. This doesn't mean you can't support us! Please spread the word about our campaign. Tell your friends, family, co-workers, and associates. Please pass on our information! We can be shared on Facebook, Instagram (@hhowllc), Twitter (@hhowllc), email, word of mouth, etc. If you would like to invest or sponsor with more than the options provided, or would like more details about our campaign before or after supporting, please feel free to email us at holistichealingonwheels@gmail.com. We look forward to hearing and feeling the support of our community.

story:
Klokbox - Personal Story

The safest way to give my family everything they'll need !

When tragedy struck our family we realized that Dad suddenly dying meant lots would change. Our loss of his memories, his inspiration and shared stories was compounded by his not having a will. That certainly put things into perspective and I didn't want history repeating itself. 

I was looking for a really safe way to let my family know how much I cared in case anything should happen to me. To do this, all I could find were expensive lawyers who made the process complex and impersonal.

Klokbox has evolved into a strong desire for a clear, enduring legacy to my wife and 5 kids. A way I can connect with them after I'm gone. I wanted to create something they could interact with forever, but at the same time it all needed to be clear, concise and legally binding.

 

 

Less than 30% of the population plan their lives or create a lasting legacy plan. This seems crazy considering death is inevitable but it's something we simply don’t want to think about. Dying is such a terrible industry, I thought - let’s shake it up.

The legacy market is not just boring it’s also overpriced, confusing, and inconvenient.

Times change and industries get disrupted. Klokbox connects your life plan for future generations. It's literally your digital diary, a place to express your intentions with clarity, to give inspiration. Klokbox is so comprehensive, it covers everything you'll need to craft your complete legacy,  to share things your family will need and love to see ... once you're gone.

 

How it works

Are you Astute, an Early Adopter or simply Inquisitive? Klokbox is right for You!

Klokbox uses a technology that hasn't been seen before - it's disruptive.  It addresses a problem every child and parent encounters - because death is inevitable. Klokbox is the miracle to share your assets or meaningful things, inspiration, memories, to plan your complete legacy - the right way.

 

 

          KLOKBOX - Helps Solve important Problems, over which we procrastinate.

The Gift that just Keeps Giving 

  • Create Your Story Book - All the stuff your loved ones will need after you're gone.
  • Share your Memories, Will, Passwords, Messages, Secrets or Arrangements.
  • It's Fun to Use - it's Interactive, Convenient, and Adaptable.
  • Decide Who Gets What -  keep your stuff Tidy.
  • Klokbox is Comprehensive, Inexpensive, Simple - And Legally Binding.
  • Raised funds will be used for launching Klokbox, marketing, and growth campaigns.
  • We do NOT require your hard-earned funds for Development.
  • No matter the raised amount, you will still receive your Klokbox.
  • The Greatest Paradox of your life exclusively resolved with Klokbox.

 

The Impact

Your contribution will Make a Difference to Families who Cannot Afford a Lawyer. Help us bring awareness to a legacy planning and will writing industry that's outdated. Together we will help those unaware of the consequences of not having a will and legacy plan. Helping those who forget and those who are confused by the complexity of the process.

 

Why Klokbox?

  • Klokbox allows ordinary families to Avoid Disputes, Legal Bills, find value in clarity and love.
  • What we are creating is the most important social connection you'll ever make.
  • It’s Safe and Private.
  • Store important information on your most Secure Digital Safe.
  • Save your memories and pass them on with Klokbox while you're still enjoying life.
  • I created successful offline projects in construction, hotels and tech, my team and I know how to reach the finish line.
  • Be part of the movement that disrupts outdated systems and brings clarity to the legal industry.
  • Help us make this real for real people to have trust in humanity.
  • This project is hugely important to us and of enormous value to our contributors - the world.

 

Challenges

The challenge we face is that this project may not gain adequate traction, but with your help, we can create sufficient users that will allow for continuous marketing.

You have nothing to lose - at worst you'll have a legally binding last will and testament at a fraction of the cost.

Lawyers and governments get rich when we procrastinate and families suffer through apathy, argument or confusion. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, I understand but it would mean the world to me if you help me spread the word:

  • Please bring attention to this project - make some noise about Klokbox.
  • Use the IndieGoGo Share tools!
  • Use your social circle.
  • Tell friends that have kids about Klokbox
  • Tell your family to take a look at this magic box!

Thank you for taking the time to check out Klokbox, Every Little Bit Helps.

Thank you for taking the time to check out Klokbox, Every Little Bit Helps.

story:
Brick City Yoga Overview 

Welcome to the Brick City Yoga campaign page! I'm Kate, owner and founder of Brick City Yoga. I'm excited to bring yoga to Benton Park West. 

I purchased the building at 2758 Wyoming summer of 2018 and began the remodeling process, with the goal of creating a community space and restoring the corner of Wyoming & California.  

Brick City Yoga aims to be an economically accessible yoga studio and community space.  I received my 200 RYT certification through Yoga Buzz St. Louis, and my 95-hour RCYT through Southtown Yoga in St. Louis. All Brick City Yoga instructors are certified instructors, and many have specialized certifications. We will offer affordable ($10) yoga classes and accommodate all levels from beginner to experienced  to speciality workshops and children's programming.

What We Need & What You Get

Building out and opening a studio is pricey! We are hoping to raise $10-15K from our campaign to offset some of our expenses. You'll help us: 

  • Pay down some of our construction debt (yikes)
  • Build out our lobby
  • Install our sound system
  • Install our CRM system
  • Add signage to the building
  • Stock the studio with props
  • And more!

As a thank you, we are offering several perks including yoga classes, cool logo merchandise from STL-Style, exclusive product from Lark Skin Co., handbags from Mandolin, and of course high fives and eternal gratitude. Check out our perks for more details and stay tunes as more perks may be added. 

Brick City Yoga in the Community 

Your support will allow us to open the doors, and we think our studio will have a pretty great impact on our neighborhood too: 

  • Weekly classes will be $10 all the time
  • We will pay our instructors fairly 
  • We will contribute profits from one weekly class to a local non-profit
  • You'll also be supporting the local makers featured in this campaign
  • Our rehab will ensure the corner of California and Wyoming is vibrant and inviting again! 

Risks & Challenges 

Of course, with any construction project, there are always risks and challenges. We've had to increase our budget a bit, are learning about required permits and working on our patience with timelines. While we are hopeful we can open in the Winter, our biggest risk is not hitting this deadline, but we are confident we will open very soon! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign on your social feeds and sign up for our newsletter to follow our progress!  Interested in a future collaboration or perk you don't see? Email us at BrickCityYogaSTL@gmail.com!

story:
My Journey:

2020 was a year of reckoning for all of us to rethink our relationships with nature, with others, and most importantly with ourselves. For me, this past year propelled me to pursue my passion for holistic wellness through ethically sourced spices. I am excited to launch Holy Spice to offer a peek into the wellness spices I grew up having, and to extend the sense of comfort it gave me and to everyone around me.

All Natural Wellness:

South Asian food is known for its use of spices to enhance its flavor, but the Ayurvedic science behind the benefits of each spice in the harmonious blends that grace our kitchen shelves is often ignored. The goodness of spices remains a well-kept secret with Indian household cooks who work up magic in the kitchen.

I wish to reveal and celebrate that knowledge by sharing it with you in an accessible manner. Holy Spices will offer a plethora of ways to use spices beyond the exotic golden turmeric latte, and into the daily cup of chai. A simple switch to a healthier lifestyle, with a dash of wellbeing into your plate!

Our Products

We will be launching with 5 harmonious blends of spices that have been handcrafted based on our generational family recipes:

1) Compassion Blend - Made from Ginger, Cloves, Jaggery, Holy Basil, Turmeric and Cinnamon  

2) Tranquility Blend - Made from Holy Basil, Mint and Ginger 

3) Purity Blend- Made from Licorice Root, Mint and Ginger

4) Holy Turmeric- 100% pure Turmeric

5) Holy Amla- 100% pure Amla (Indian Gooseberry)

Where will the funds be used?

100% of your funds will be used to source and ship our products from India.  We will be covering all packaging, marketing, operations and sales costs. 

Our Sourcing Partner, Vrutti

Well if there is anyone we trust in supporting our farmers and making sure they have all the resources, it's Vrutti. We believe that empowerment, just like physical health, needs nourishment at the granular level to become truly sustainable. Despite the vast troves of knowledge that farmers possess, they are unable to make steady and fair income from their occupation due to fast-paced, insatiable markets that exploit natural resources. Organizations like Vrutti  recognize this gap and are committed to creating systems that can make farming profitable as well as sustainable. 

We support Vrutti’s efforts by sourcing some our spices from female farmers in near Bangalore, India. 

What sets us apart?

We firmly believe in walking our talk and are committed to providing all natural ethically sourced spices that have been lab tested and FDA approved! Our team is WOC owned and operated, meaning everyone from our suppliers to our marketeers are women.
