story:
Our Mission

More than anything, healing projects must affirm that this story is true; that our society in its current iteration wasn’t built for human flourishing and that all of the personal issues we face--be they sadness, financial insecurity, or anxiety--started outside of us. Consequently, the resolution to these issues must not simply involve looking within but without.  Our self-help and self-care are only as effective as our collective-help and collective-care.  Radical Ritual is an offering to the current of people and movements looking to live in love and longing to transform society as we transform ourselves. 

 

Our Product

There is a growing market for “pull decks” such as Tarot cards and affirmation decks. While the decks are generally advertised as multi-use, most commonly an individual pulls a card and uses the message of that card to stimulate reflection on their life and provide clarity on their wonders.  While these cards are often used in community, the content of the cards emphasizes internal reflection.

 

Our goal with the radical ritual deck is to create a centerpiece that facilitates community healing and collective reflection.  The 45 card deck is composed of three types of cards, each which corresponds to one aspect of our model of community healing.  In addition to healing and affirming the self, which is the prevailing focus of most decks and healing projects generally, we have incorporated cards that encourage us to reflect on society and on the natural world:

 

  • Hold cards: Hold cards are like a warm blanket.  They encourage you, lift you up, and kickstart internal healing.

 

  • Push cards: Push cards push you to think about the interlocking nature between self and society. They prompt us to make connections between our pain and social pain and externalize our emotions so that we can recalibrate how we need to take action to change the world around us.

 

  • Ground cards: Ground cards connect us to place and time.  They remind us of our origin story so that we are better suited to understand the natural and historical factors that make us who we are and tell us where we are going.

 

Twelve sample cards are featured below: 

 

How To Use The Deck

  1. Set them on the table at a dinner party and use them to generate intentional conversation
  2. Use them in movement classes as fodder for intention setting
  3. Use them as a conversation starter at your book club
  4. Tape them on your boss's door
  5. Use them as bookmarks
  6. Grab a sharpie and use them to make your own blackout poems
  7. Tape them to your mirror
  8. Use them as writing prompts
  9. For more stripped-down reflections, focus on just the images or the bolded text and use the cards like a traditional pull deck to answer questions, build intentions and develop manifestations.
  10. Use them in a community building activity to bring humanity into activist and academic spaces

Your deck will come with 10+ "guide cards" that will give you ideas for radical rituals.  A sample is included below: 

Our Plan

Your contributions will be used to cover the cost of printing the decks and packaging, purchasing shipping materials, and investing in the future of creative projects for collective healing.  We recognize that ideas generated in this deck are not the product of one or two brains, but of the collective imagination of all of us. In an effort to reinvest in the creative commons, a percentage of the sales of each deck will be used to fund Beautiful Infinity Publishing Collective, a cooperative publishing group that incubates and publishes the work of creators making work that speaks truth to power.  Finally, in addition to using recyclable shipping containers, a percentage of our profits will be used to offset the carbon cost involved in the production and distribution of our product.

 

Our hope is to have the first order of decks printed during June 2019 and available for direct-to-consumer web sales in July 2019.  Should we have sufficient funds, we hope to expand the web purchasing option to prints, postcards, and stickers featuring images from the deck.

story:
I Need Your Help!

Help Me Continue to Teach Embodiment When the World Needs it Most.

And You Receive the Benefits!

For the past 8 years I have been offering Embodiment - Dance, Movement, Somatic Practice and Enquiry, through classes, workshops and retreats.  Its a rich tapestry of embodied learning from different perspectives to live well in the body you have.

Why Practice Embodiment?

On a fundamental level being embodied promotes health and wellbeing - mentally, emotionally and physically.  Embodiment can bring feelings of ease, relaxation and physical wellness.   It can help the nervous system to regulate, relieving stress, and promoting mental wellbeing. Continued embodiment practice can connect us to a deeper sense of contentment giving us a stronger foundation and resilience in ourselves even in the face of challenge.  This is something we all need during these challenging times.

The work I offer and how it touches people moves me so very deeply.  It occupies my life.  Its a gift to be with a group or an individual who is moved so deeply just by being themselves, how ever that looks; the joy of simply being.

Why I Need Your Help and Support To Continue To Teach This Work

At this time as the world is changing, embodiment is so needed, it breaks my heart at the thought of having to let my work go. 

Covid regulations have changed our way of living.  For me, teaching in person on 'the whole' has not been possible for many months and continues to be a potentially changeable situation for the for seeable future.  Also, many of the folk who most need my work are confined to their homes.  

I find myself in a difficult situation, this year has seen most of my usual work possibilities not possible, meaning I haven't had the income to make the changes I've needed to adjust and adapt to the 'new normal'.  

These are the areas I need some help with -

I want to offer Wellbeing for Women (and men) - mat and movement classes ONLINE and One to One Embodiment Sessions ONLINE.  But my own laptop is not reliable and is showing its age, it can not cope with the load for good quality video and music required to teach a session, this is really holding me back, the poor laptop needs upgrading.  Along with needing some additional equipment to make a session come together.  

Behind the scenes - a lot goes into offering this work, it requires hours of continued development and ongoing training, I think everything that is valuable has time, support and effort behind it.  This work is no different.   To continue to offer my best ongoingly to all the beautiful souls who attend my work I need to have the support of the teachers I work with; this element is vitally important.

I’m asking for three months rent relief to get things back on track, turn the tide and get this beautiful Embodiment work happening in new ways in this new normal.

Your help will give me the boost I need to get back out there to offer a broader range of my work to more people who need it in the current Covid climate when teaching in the same space is not always an option.   

Here is a break down of what the money will cover:

£1500 - Laptop, refurbished with high speed and storage  

£300 -  Additional equipment to offer online classes - sound card, second hand ipad etc

£350   - Business Support one to one to help get my business back on track 

£350 - Web Site, and Social Media Advertising.

£1500 - Ongoing Training/Support In Movement, Enquiry and Embodiment.  This is part of ongoing education with my teachers in embodiment that I can no longer fund because the money was used to live on during lockdown.

£990 - 3 months rent to support things while I get back on track

Total - £4990

 

and I Want to Offer My Work To You In Return...

In return for your generosity I will be offering mini online workshops, ongoing groups and a women's embodiment journey, for you to receive the full benefit of my work as thanks.​ This work means so much to me and I believe it is a valuable and needed resource.

 

 

About Lee

For me dance and movement can uncover the nature of relationship between things. Connections within - fascia and connective tissue. With others - how is it to meet another, as ourselves - is it ok to show up as I am, letting things be as they are.  With the world around us.

I have been dancing and moving for the past 17 years.  Ecstatic dance classes, contact improv, somatics, movement in landscape and warm water, Well Being for Women Mat and Movement Classes and it’s all taken me on a journey of discovery, through joy and challenge, contraction and flow.

I offer space for this exploration.

Training -

Contact Improvisation 140 hour dance training - Berlin - Joerg Hassman and Daniel Werner 

iRest - Yoga Nidra - Level 1 Certificate - 40 Hours

Birthlight Well Woman Training 

Walk of Life Training Year 1 in Non-stylised and Environmental Movement - Helen Poynor

Massage Diplomas - Holistic Massage, Pregnancy Massage, Abdominal Massage.  Massage for Paliative Care

 

Testimonial -

I am blessed to have worked with Lee over several years now, and am massively grateful for her capacity to hold an extremely rare depth of safety, empathy and connection in the classes. Lee is intrinsically respectful of the group and individual process, and also brings a huge wealth of knowledge and integrity to the exploration of being in the body, and our human experience. 

My experience of participating in Lee's work with women has touched my soul very deeply and I feel deeply privileged to have her support. -  HM - Bristol

story:
The School of Golden Transformation

Katerina Kostkova is super excited to launch her new online study portal for Golden Transformation with hypnotherapies, meditations, yoga and Golden Rituals that will support you to live your best life. 

This is such an important campaign that will help Katerina get the online portal off the ground and into reality. 

Katerina’s healing path started 10 years ago with regression therapy and in 2015 she completed her studies of Agama Yoga teachings in Thailand where she lived for two years in an ashram. 

Katerina has been teaching on a daily basis since 2015. Her work is based upon the experiences of many high level teachers and expansive experiences. Kashmir Shaivism brings her a great knowledge of the alchemy of yoga, self-healing and it gives her the opportunity to live a liberated life! Katerina also writes articles for one of the most famous Czech yoga magazines.

Golden Transformation As Written by Katerina...

Transformation is a process we go through in constant waves, in order for transformation to have real potential, we need fire, but the fire must not be too strong so we do not burn ourselves in the process.

Golden Transformation is the process of through the activation of a set of Golden Keys, or steps.

The whole process is the process of awakening and activating the body, mind and soul. This then creates a unified connection with the experience of being.

During this transformation process and reclaiming of our power through Golden Keys, we will activate new experiences in our body, mind, and soul and we can use this to empower our every day life. 

Here are some of the keys: 

+ Activation of the system through physical practice / yoga (specific asanas) - cleansing the body and individual chakras

+ Purification Techniques - Uddiana Bhanda + Nauli Kriya - Purification of Organs

+ Voice healing - voice activation through vowel pranyama + sound healing - increased vibration

+ Guided meditation - increasing vibrations by purifying individual chakras / beginning of the golden process of transformation

+ Guided deep relaxation - Integration of the golden process

+ Work with visualization full activation - Golden Sphere

+ Manifestation

+ Golden reality - Anchoring intentions / Abundance of presence

What will this activation bring?

It will bring a multidimensional experience of oneself, and a manifestation of your intentions into everyday reality, abundance, anchoring oneself, connection to source, and a creation reality from your center point. It will also bring strength, vitality, awareness of one's abilities, and a strengthening of one's potential. You will also have full acceptance of oneself in God's nature.
 

What We Need & What You Get

So, here is what Katerina needs to get this started and what you get:

  • We have several options to choose from, including the set of Golden Ritual Keys for just £44 for the first 111 people. This includes five bonus hypnotherapies from Stephen James Burford (details below). 
     
  • We are looking for a minimum of £10,000 to get this going. This will cover the cost of filming and editing the videos, the Kajabi platform for a year ($199 a month) to host the course, brand design and initial business set up costs. £25,000 would help Katerina really get this to the next level more quickly and anything beyond that would be fabulous.
     
  • NEW: Book a ticket to join Katerina live in Prague in The Golden Temple Praha on October 17th. This special event on October 17th is limited to 10 people. You will receive a ticket to the event. 
     
  • Every donation counts, thank you for your support!

What Do The Golden Rituals Include?

The Golden Rituals will come in a package of videos and audios. One of the most amazing things about Agama Yoga is that you do it with your eyes closed. This means that once you have watched the video a couple of times then you can follow with audio on your speakers or on your headphones - it's much easier than setting up your laptop or computer each morning! Just find a space to put your yoga mat, put on the audio and listen to Katja's soothing and calming voice!

It would help you if you had some basic understanding of yoga (i.e. you have done a few classes before). 

In Katja's 8 Golden Rituals you'll be taken through:

1) Somatic work - First we must prepare and purify the body, we will work on specific asanas that activate specific chakras. Whilst the body prepares, the chakras become cleansed.

2) Cleansing techniques - You will learn how to repair and cleanse the organs in your Golden Ritual practice.

3) Voice healing - Prepare and cleanse your voice. It's time to take the power back, working with Vishudda chakra.

4) Guided meditations - This will take you on a rich and deep experience of your whole being

5) Deep relaxation - Prepare to relax on a new level of being

6) Working with visualization - Your greatest visions are the fuel for your golden dream life.

7) Manifest your greatest reality You will be shown how to bring all it all into form.

8) Golden reality - Gratitude and blessings for your new Golden reality. 

BONUS!

You will also receive 5 free hypnotherapies in English from Stephen James Burford, a certified RTT (Rapid Transformational Therapy Practitioner).

These will include hypnotherapies on:

+ Abundance

+ Self-Love

+ Divine Plan Alignment

+ Taking Back Your Power

+ Manifest Healthy Relationships

Stephen's recordings are life changing (see the testimonials below). You can also use these as part of your Golden Morning Ritual practice. In total you will have 13 (The Divine Feminine Number) Golden Rituals to choose from.

They will average between 20 minutes and 40 minutes in length. 

The Impact

Here are a few reasons why this perks of this project are valuable to you and to the wider world. 

  • Katerina has a proven track record of helping people heal through yoga and her healing therapies. Whichever product you choose, you will be receiving real healing on the mental, physical, and spiritual levels. 
     
  • The Golden Rituals are a proven method that, when launched, will have lasting impact for people all over the world. These are teachings and healings the world needs, especially in this difficult year of 2020 and beyond. 
     
  • Katerina is working with Stephen James Burford to get this project launched. Stephen has built an online study portal, an online magazine, and a hugely successful podcast. He has also successfully run his own crowdfunding campaign in 2015 to launch his own online study portal. Stephen is kindly offering his Abundance Hypnotherapies for this crowdfunding. 

Katerina Kostkova Testimonial:

"Katerina went higher than my expectations, she is really knowing what she is doing. She can handle the whole situation in complex way and guide you through your unique self. It was first session and it was really unexpected, it was very easy for me to connect and it went so deep. I could see way certain things were repeating in my life constantly and I could clean and finish them through the session with her. When you want to work on this level with someone really good where u feel like at home. I recomend her!"

Pavla Kamali

"Katja is a wonderful healer and card reader. I did few sessions with her these last years and she revealed me incredible things that happened afterwards. 
Besides, she could work at an energetic level to sooth the pain or give me insight to go through my challenges in a better state of mind. I really recommend everyone to try her methods and benefit her radiant presence. It's truly mind blowing."

Ricardo, Yoga Teacher

"I have received an energy clearing and a regression therapy from Katerina and it was one of the most profound of my life. Katja has been on a deep healing path for the last decade and it more than shows in her work. It is my honor to help Katerina bring her work to the online space and I am so happy for her future online clients that they get to experience her."

Stephen James Burford

Purchase Stephen's My Ecstatic Rebirth Book

Written and read by Stephen James Burford, My Ecstatic Rebirth: The 10 Keys To Unleash Your Power, Pleasure and Purpose was created to give you the space to get in touch with your divinity. 

This book exists to make the clarity more accessible to jumpstart your transformational journey.

In this light and easy-to-listen audiobook, Stephen will lovingly allow your soul to have the breathing room to explore higher expressions of consciousness.

This carefully crafted content takes you by the hand on a discovery path to your mind, body and soul.

By following the 10 Keys to Unleash your Power, Pleasure and Purpose you will be opening the door to a fulfilling, expansive life where you are in integrity and alignment with your Divine Plan.

Discover how to deprogram yourself from the conditioning that keeps you trapped in fear, shame and guilt about your sexuality, power and pleasure. Let your limitations fall off from you to reveal the true radiance of your Soul.

You are the One you are seeking, and you hold the answers within you!

Spark miracles into every corner of your life, and unleash your love like never before! Bring an unending cosmic flow of joy, power and pleasure into your reality.    

In, this book you will be guided to understand how the 10 keys play a major role in creating the ecstatic, blissful life that is your birthright.

You will be introduced to practical tools you can explore to expand your consciousness and allow your Soul to unleash its full ecstatic potential.

Your ecstatic healing power is greater than you could imagine… and it has always been within you!

 

Abundance Hynotherapy:

Abundance Hypnotherapy Testimonial:

"All I can say is Wow! Abundant I AM! I am finding myself saying yes to opportunities without friction. I am finding myself more open to positive thinking when it comes to my finances. I am also finding that I am more in tune on what I spend my money on.

Outside of the Abundance, I am noticing that I am making more clearer decisions in general. I am taking a pause instead of reacting on / in my emotions when faced with a decision. But most of all I am gaining the love and awareness that I did not have for myself.

I am excited to move to the next phase and still use this therapy mixed in my daily practices."

Melissa Elizondo

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with your friends and business acquaintances who want help their healing journey or help others on their healing journey!

Choose your perk now! :-)

The School of Golden Transformation
Katerina Kostkova is super excited to launch her new online study portal for Golden Transformation with hypnotherapies, meditations, yoga and Golden Rituals that will support you to live your best life. 
This is such an important campaign that will help Katerina get the online portal off the ground and into reality. 
Katerina’s healing path started 10 years ago with regression therapy and in 2015 she completed her studies of Agama Yoga teachings in Thailand where she lived for two years in an ashram. Katerina has been teaching on a daily basis since 2015. Her work is based upon the experiences of many high level teachers and expansive experiences. Kashmir Shaivism brings her a great knowledge of the alchemy of yoga, self-healing and it gives her the opportunity to live a liberated life! Katerina also writes articles for one of the most famous Czech yoga magazines.
Golden Transformation As Written by Katerina...
Transformation is a process we go through in constant waves, in order for transformation to have real potential, we need fire, but the fire must not be too strong so we do not burn ourselves in the process.
Golden Transformation is the process of through the activation of a set of Golden Keys, or steps.
The whole process is the process of awakening and activating the body, mind and soul. This then creates a unified connection with the experience of being.
During this transformation process and reclaiming of our power through Golden Keys, we will activate new experiences in our body, mind, and soul and we can use this to empower our every day life. 
Here are some of the keys: 
+ Activation of the system through physical practice / yoga (specific asanas) - cleansing the body and individual chakras
+ Purification Techniques - Uddiana Bhanda + Nauli Kriya - Purification of Organs
+ Voice healing - voice activation through vowel pranyama + sound healing - increased vibration
+ Guided meditation - increasing vibrations by purifying individual chakras / beginning of the golden process of transformation
+ Guided deep relaxation - Integration of the golden process
+ Work with visualization full activation - Golden Sphere
+ Manifestation
+ Golden reality - Anchoring intentions / Abundance of presence
What will this activation bring?
It will bring a multidimensional experience of oneself, and a manifestation of your intentions into everyday reality, abundance, anchoring oneself, connection to source, and a creation reality from your center point. It will also bring strength, vitality, awareness of one's abilities, and a strengthening of one's potential. You will also have full acceptance of oneself in God's nature. 
What We Need & What You Get

So, here is what Katerina needs to get this started and what you get:

We have several options to choose from, including the set of Golden Ritual Keys for just £44 for the first 111 people. This includes five bonus hypnotherapies from Stephen James Burford (details below).  
We are looking for a minimum of £10,000 to get this going. This will cover the cost of filming and editing the videos, the Kajabi platform for a year ($199 a month) to host the course, brand design and initial business set up costs. £25,000 would help Katerina really get this to the next level more quickly and anything beyond that would be fabulous. 

NEW: Book a ticket to join Katerina live in Prague in The Golden Temple Praha on October 17th. This special event on October 17th is limited to 10 people. You will receive a ticket to the event.  
Every donation counts, thank you for your support!

What Do The Golden Rituals Include?
The Golden Rituals will come in a package of videos and audios. One of the most amazing things about Agama Yoga is that you do it with your eyes closed. This means that once you have watched the video a couple of times then you can follow with audio on your speakers or on your headphones - it's much easier than setting up your laptop or computer each morning! Just find a space to put your yoga mat, put on the audio and listen to Katja's soothing and calming voice!
It would help you if you had some basic understanding of yoga (i.e. you have done a few classes before). 
In Katja's 8 Golden Rituals you'll be taken through:1) Somatic work - First we must prepare and purify the body, we will work on specific asanas that activate specific chakras. Whilst the body prepares, the chakras become cleansed.
2) Cleansing techniques - You will learn how to repair and cleanse the organs in your Golden Ritual practice.
3) Voice healing - Prepare and cleanse your voice. It's time to take the power back, working with Vishudda chakra.
4) Guided meditations - This will take you on a rich and deep experience of your whole being
5) Deep relaxation - Prepare to relax on a new level of being
6) Working with visualization - Your greatest visions are the fuel for your golden dream life.
7) Manifest your greatest reality You will be shown how to bring all it all into form.
8) Golden reality - Gratitude and blessings for your new Golden reality. 
BONUS!
You will also receive 5 free hypnotherapies in English from Stephen James Burford, a certified RTT (Rapid Transformational Therapy Practitioner).
These will include hypnotherapies on:
+ Abundance
+ Self-Love
+ Divine Plan Alignment
+ Taking Back Your Power
+ Manifest Healthy Relationships
Stephen's recordings are life changing (see the testimonials below). You can also use these as part of your Golden Morning Ritual practice. In total you will have 13 (The Divine Feminine Number) Golden Rituals to choose from.
They will average between 20 minutes and 40 minutes in length. 

The Impact
Here are a few reasons why this perks of this project are valuable to you and to the wider world. 

Katerina has a proven track record of helping people heal through yoga and her healing therapies. Whichever product you choose, you will be receiving real healing on the mental, physical, and spiritual levels.  
The Golden Rituals are a proven method that, when launched, will have lasting impact for people all over the world. These are teachings and healings the world needs, especially in this difficult year of 2020 and beyond.

He has also successfully run his own crowdfunding campaign in 2015 to launch his own online study portal. Stephen is kindly offering his Abundance Hypnotherapies for this crowdfunding.

story:
The Zzzummary

A year ago, we were a NYC-based start-up experimenting with a unique concept of offering on-demand sleep in the city that never sleeps. We’d like to thank the 3,000+ customers who supported our new venture last year and gave us helpful feedback along the way. After listening to you and working with the regulators, we are back with even cozier sleeping pods that are better than ever, a custom reservation platform that's coded right here in Silicon Alley, and a unique, on location meditation program.

A year ago, we were a NYC-based start-up experimenting with a unique concept of offering on-demand sleep in the city that never sleeps. story:
Short Summary

Whether you are someone who enjoys an audience or someone who prefers to slightly sway in a room by yourself, most of us have joyful memories of dance. And, the joy of dance is contagious. Movements for Movements is a non-profit concept in the start-up stage. It aims to offer dance/movement therapy workshops to communities such as underfunded schools, boys' and girls' clubs, veterans suffering from Post Traumatic Stress, Native American reservations, treatment centers, refugee camps, and many more. 

Quentin Robinson's goal for teaching dance broadened after he conducted a dance workshop on the Nakivale Refugee Settlement of Uganda, with the American Refugee Committee. He became acutely aware of, not only the potential that dance has in breaking social barriers, but of the inescapable need for dance/movement therapy in impoverished and traumatized communities. Dance is a universal language which we all share, no matter our socioeconomic class, gender, race, or nationality. 

With 20 years of professional dance experience, Quentin is very familiar with the grounding effect physical movement has on the body, emotions, thoughts, and spirit.  Intentional physical movement grounds us in the present moment.  It fully focuses the mind on what is happening NOW, and it allows us to immediately attend to the space we are moving through.  This practice of focusing the mind on only the current moment is called "mindfulness." Mindfulness permits the brain to be at peace so the nervous system can relax, recharge, and reset. There is universal evidence that practicing mindfulness is the key to healing trauma, and dance is a form of mindfulness which incorporates great joy! 

With the help of donations, Quentin aims to start the non-profit organization Movements for Movements to provide dance/movement workshops. He hopes to reach local and international communities suffering from trauma associated with poverty and violence. Your donations will meet the needs of Movements for Movements non-profit start-up costs as well as travel costs.

Exactly What We Need 

A description of our current funding needs:

  • to file articles of incorporation with Montana's Secretary of State
  • to file with the IRS for tax-exempt status
  • a physical office to conduct clerical business such as booking workshops, filing confidential client documents, and space to store marketing or promotional items 
  • to start annual fundraising events which will keep our efforts sustainable
  • to offset travel funds which include gas or plane tickets, hotel stays, and daily food allowances for Quentin and other dance instructors

Risks & Challenges

Our two greatest challenges are:

  • creating consistency and sustainability through fundraisers and grants
  • reaching the neediest communities

We are uniquely qualified to overcome these challenges because of the unbelievable support of our expansive community.  Missoula, Montana, where Movements for Movements is located, supports social initiatives like no other. And, Quentin's dance network is international. We are confident that the momentum of this project will be sustained by the skill, support, funds, and passion generated by our  people. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute funds, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please, folks, get the word out and make some noise about Movements for Movements! 
  • Use Indiegogo's share tools and share this to other social media sites! 
  • Contact us about any community which would benefit from dance/movement therapy

story:
SKINourishment has been revolutionizing skin care since 1996 with 100% plant-based, cruelty-free, non-GMO, food-grade ingredients that nourish your skin, and your mind.

Our newest brand - POLYN - makes 100% plant-based skin care to everyone. 

 

Twenty years ago before Whole Foods was a household name and before TOMS shoes existed, before things like GMOs and animal testing were in the public consciousness, founder and aromatherapist, Polly Glasse was in her kitchen formulating what would become the first lotion bar on the market to address the fast-healing needs of climbers’ cracked, callused and dry hands. Her skin care products became known under the brand climbOn, a line of 100% plant-based, cruelty-free products adored by climbers around the world including the #1 climber Tommy Caldwell.

Polly realized the need for 100% plant-based, NON-GMO, vegan & cruelty-free skin care, was not just a need for the brave climbers and athletes, but an opportunity for all of us to rid our skin and bodies of toxins. This campaign is designed to introduce SKINourishment’s everyday skin care line - POLYN - to everyone.

The POLYN Essential 5 Face Line includes a regimen to exfoliate dead skin, clean and purify, stimulate collagen, and rejuvenate skin. This bundle is made from the following plants: 

  • Purifying Clay Mask - Adzuki beans, Bentonite, and Rosehip
  • Invigorating Face Wash - Peppermint, Horsetail, and Castille
  • Invigorating Toner - Peppermint, Echnachia, and Lavender
  • Cooling Under Eye Serum - Aloe, Rosehip + Frankincense
  • Regenerative Face Serum - Tuberose wax, Rosehip, and Shea butter

What People Love About Polyn 

Tweet: Together we can say '99% "natural" is not good enough. "Natural" can still mean a product contains synthetic ingredients. We demand products for the outside of our body that are as good as the food that goes in. And if they are good enough to eat, we should not have to test them on animals to develop tumors that meet a minimally acceptable level. We can eschew synthetic fragrances and embrace natural aromas whose intention is as powerful as the formula itself.

Under current laws and regulations, companies are allowed to use the term “Natural” to describe, advertise and market a product that contains synthetic ingredients. Our goal is to spread this message. Demand that products for use on the outside of our body are as good as the food that goes in. If the ingredients are good enough to eat; they should not have to be tested on animals! Synthetic fragrances should be eschewed in favor of natural aromas and essential oils.  We must become aware and intentional about what we put on our skin and use formulas that nourish our bodies and spirits.

What We Need & What You Get

Our Goal: 

  • $10,000 – Launch POLYN & Share Story with New Retailers
    • Support new sales team to help us place POLYN with new retailers 
    • Sales Kits / Retailer Samples to accelerate distribution
    • Donate 100  “free products” to Love Fund to people in need (who can not pay, cancer survivors, elderly)

Unique Perks - You Can Only Get Here

 

  • Exclusive Offical Backer POLYN T-Shirt
  • Articles on Using Nature to Live Healthier
    • Article: Top Ingredients in Natural Products to Avoid
    • Article: 10 Essential Oils to Use at Home
  • Custom Lab - Skin Care Consulting with Polly Glasse
    • Polly Glasse has studied aromatherapy and Eastern medicine for over 25 years. She has developed a portfolio of Skin Care products that address common needs and tap herbal essences. Customers claim she has helped solve complex problems that thousands of dollars of product or care could not do. She has also helped people with specific issues that could not be solved with her standard products. This perk gives you 2 hours of consulting, and if Polly does not have a ready-made product, she will create a ‘special potion’ for you with the ingredients list and formulation. Includes 2 hours of consulting and one application of a custom product. Additional purchases of potions will be billed separately.

  • Signed Copy, THE PUSH, Tommy Caldwell's New Book – (Early Access, Launching May) The Push: A Climber's Journey of Endurace, Risk, Going Beyond Limits, is a dramatic, inspiring memoir by legendary rock climber Tommy Caldwell, the first person to free climb the Dawn Wall of Yosemite’s El Capitan in Yosemite National Park. Every day, and after climbing, Tommy uses SKINourishment’s climbOn Bar.  To help Tommy succeed in his quest for the Dawn Wall summit, we overnighted him climbOn Bar & Creme and crossFIXE MUSCLE paste.  Tommy is excited to help Polly and SKINourishment launch this campaign and make his book available to her supporters.

THE PUSH Accolades:   
“If you want to be inspired by a great leader if you want to feel what it takes to do what no one thought possible if you want to be absorbed by a heroic journey– Tommy Caldwell’s story is one of the best you could ever hope to find.” – Jim Collins, author of Good to Great

  • Kammok Hammock A fellow Certified B Corp - Located in sunny Austin, Texas, Kammok is an outdoor company focused on high performance gear for hammock camping. Texas tough and featherlight, Kammok gear is designed for backpackers, travelers, and campers who want comfort without the weight. From hammocks to sleeping bags, tents to trail quilts, Kammok gear is built to outlast your wildest endeavors and covered by a lifetime guarantee. As a 1% for the Planet company, Kammok gives one percent of annual revenue to Explore Austin, a nonprofit providing outdoor education, leadership training, and mentorship to youth.
  •  
  • The Kammok Roo™ is a high-performance camping hammock designed to provide you with an exceptional outdoor experience. The 2016 Roo is tear resistant, incredibly comfortable, and built to last a lifetime. Includes Python Straps, full strength climbing 'biners and a stuff sack. Roo is perfect for two!

     

  • B Corp – “Be Your Best” Gear – Patagonia, Prana + POLYN
    • B Corps Patagonia and Prana are two brands synonymous with care, intention, and adventure. They have been our inspiration in getting our B Corp certification, and no doubt have inspired many of you. We decided to put together a bundle with gift certificates from both of them so you can buy apparel and gear to feel good and achieve your potential. Also included is a copy of the recent republished “Let My People Go Surfing by Patagonia founder Yvon Chinouard. 

  • Wimberley Wine Tour & Custom Lab Skin Care Consulting
    • Wimberley is located in the heart of the Texas Hill Country, between Austin and San Antonio. The center of Wimberley is situated at the confluence of Cypress Creek and the Blanco River, amid bluebonnets, wineries and Cypress trees. We will treat you to a day with Polly to tour SKINourishment, hear the origin story first hand, learn some – do-it-yourself tricks, and share your personal needs with her. The team will take you to a winery and share the music of the Hill Country.

  • Climbing with Tommy Caldwell 
    • Tommy Caldwell is a legendary American rock climber, SKINourishment climbOn customer, supporter and dear friend. He made first ascents (FA) of some of the United States' hardest sport routes (as of 2008) including Kryptonite (5.14c/d) and Flex Luthor (a possible 5.15a) at the Fortress of Solitude, Colorado. In January 2015, Caldwell completed the first-ever free climb of the Dawn Wall of El Capitan in Yosemite National Park. To complete this historic climb, SKINourishment overnighted him climbOn Bar, Creme, and crossFIXE MUSCLE paste. These products helped his skin heal quickly and kept him on the rock. To support Polly and his friends at SKINourishment, Tommy is making himself available for a day of climbing. He will share his love for the products along with stories from his new book, THE PUSH, and hours of excitement climbing.

The Impact Your Purchase Makes

Your contribution is valuable to us and will help in the following meaningful ways:

  • A pioneering woman entrepreneur will get the chance to thrive and grow organically  as the ‘natural skin care industry’ competition heats up and we as consumers demand non-toxic, cruelty-free products 
  • Improve the quality of lives through our customers, employees, and suppliers,   
  • Provide better alternatives to retailers, by showcasing that 100% plant-based, Made in U.S.A. skin care is available, incredible and affordable AND that 99% natural is not good enough.

Track-Record of Success

While our vision of ourselves is new and the opportunity is now, we have been in business for years. So you will get your Perks, and your contribution will accelerate our results and increase our positive impacts.

  • We have been in business 20 years. Our products are used by the #1 climber in the world, hundreds of elite athletes, and hard-working people. We are ready to ramp our business to be a destination for natural beauty lovers seeking 100% plant-based, really natural products.
  • Great people make our skin care products by hand every week in Wimberley, Texas. We have built a production plan to scale-up our operations by three to four times. We hope to increase the job opportunity for our part-time team members and employ more production, warehouse and sales team members.
  • We ship to more than 30 countries and hundreds of retailers and distributors. We understand the requirements to meet the strictest European standards and retailer requirements. We are excited to ship our great products to you.

Love Letters - Our products in Action

 

Molly Mitchell on SKINourishment

 

Jonathan Siegrist on climbOn SPF 30 Mineral Sunscreen

 

Amanda Allen, What's in your bag?



Doctor Heather Weidner on climbOn Creme



Jonathan Siegrist on climbOn Bar

Our Team

 

 Polly Glasse - Founder & Creator

 Theresa Wall - Production Lead

 Cristi Cooksey - Production Assistant

 Paul Glasse - Head of Logistics

 Will Reynolds Young - Chief Digital Officer

 Denise James - Sales Lead

 Geoff Cline - Advisor & Legal Counsel

 Amy George - Advisor 

Risks & Challenges

Our mission to deliver good in the world has been at the core of our company from inception. To underscore that, we recently became a certified B Corp. We carry as our values – trust, transparency, and integrity. We have delivered on our promise for over twenty years. We are excited to deliver great products and perks to you via this campaign. However, if demand outstrips supply, or we have unanticipated issues or delays, we promise transparency and integrity to come to a prompt resolution that works for everyone concerned.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone can contribute financially; we invite you to share our story with your friends.  Here are some ways you can help:

  • Share our link to our campaign via Facebook, email, Twitter http://bit.ly/POLYN
  • Share our campaign hashtag # SKINLOVESPLANTS
  • Join our email newsletter

Thank you!

Polly & The SKINourishment Family
story_txt:
SKINourishment has been revolutionizing skin care since 1996 with 100% plant-based, cruelty-free, non-GMO, food-grade ingredients that nourish your skin, and your mind.Our newest brand - POLYN - makes 100% plant-based skin care to everyone.  Twenty years ago before Whole Foods was a household name and before TOMS shoes existed, before things like GMOs and animal testing were in the public consciousness, founder and aromatherapist, Polly Glasse was in her kitchen formulating what would become the first lotion bar on the market to address the fast-healing needs of climbers’ cracked, callused and dry hands. Her skin care products became known under the brand climbOn, a line of 100% plant-based, cruelty-free products adored by climbers around the world including the #1 climber Tommy Caldwell.Polly realized the need for 100% plant-based, NON-GMO, vegan & cruelty-free skin care, was not just a need for the brave climbers and athletes, but an opportunity for all of us to rid our skin and bodies of toxins. This campaign is designed to introduce SKINourishment’s everyday skin care line - POLYN - to everyone.The POLYN Essential 5 Face Line includes a regimen to exfoliate dead skin, clean and purify, stimulate collagen, and rejuvenate skin. This bundle is made from the following plants: 

Purifying Clay Mask - Adzuki beans, Bentonite, and Rosehip

Invigorating Face Wash - Peppermint, Horsetail, and Castille

Invigorating Toner - Peppermint, Echnachia, and Lavender

Cooling Under Eye Serum - Aloe, Rosehip + Frankincense

Regenerative Face Serum - Tuberose wax, Rosehip, and Shea butter
What People Love About Polyn Tweet: Together we can say '99% "natural" is not good enough. "Natural" can still mean a product contains synthetic ingredients. We demand products for the outside of our body that are as good as the food that goes in. And if they are good enough to eat, we should not have to test them on animals to develop tumors that meet a minimally acceptable level. We can eschew synthetic fragrances and embrace natural aromas whose intention is as powerful as the formula itself.Under current laws and regulations, companies are allowed to use the term “Natural” to describe, advertise and market a product that contains synthetic ingredients. Our goal is to spread this message. Demand that products for use on the outside of our body are as good as the food that goes in. If the ingredients are good enough to eat; they should not have to be tested on animals! Synthetic fragrances should be eschewed in favor of natural aromas and essential oils.  We must become aware and intentional about what we put on our skin and use formulas that nourish our bodies and spirits.What We Need & What You GetOur Goal: 
$10,000 – Launch POLYN & Share Story with New Retailers
Support new sales team to help us place POLYN with new retailers 
Sales Kits / Retailer Samples to accelerate distribution
Donate 100  “free products” to Love Fund to people in need (who can not pay, cancer survivors, elderly)

Unique Perks - You Can Only Get Here 
Exclusive Offical Backer POLYN T-Shirt

Articles on Using Nature to Live Healthier

Article: Top Ingredients in Natural Products to Avoid 


Article: 10 Essential Oils to Use at Home




Custom Lab - Skin Care Consulting with Polly Glasse Polly Glasse has studied aromatherapy and Eastern medicine for over 25 years. She has developed a portfolio of Skin Care products that address common needs and tap herbal essences. Customers claim she has helped solve complex problems that thousands of dollars of product or care could not do. She has also helped people with specific issues that could not be solved with her standard products. This perk gives you 2 hours of consulting, and if Polly does not have a ready-made product, she will create a ‘special potion’ for you with the ingredients list and formulation. Includes 2 hours of consulting and one application of a custom product. Additional purchases of potions will be billed separately.


Signed Copy, THE PUSH, Tommy Caldwell's New Book – (Early Access, Launching May) The Push: A Climber's Journey of Endurace, Risk, Going Beyond Limits, is a dramatic, inspiring memoir by legendary rock climber Tommy Caldwell, the first person to free climb the Dawn Wall of Yosemite’s El Capitan in Yosemite National Park. Every day, and after climbing, Tommy uses SKINourishment’s climbOn Bar.  To help Tommy succeed in his quest for the Dawn Wall summit, we overnighted him climbOn Bar & Creme and crossFIXE MUSCLE paste.  Tommy is excited to help Polly and SKINourishment launch this campaign and make his book available to her supporters.THE PUSH Accolades:   “If you want to be inspired by a great leader if you want to feel what it takes to do what no one thought possible if you want to be absorbed by a heroic journey– Tommy Caldwell’s story is one of the best you could ever hope to find.” – Jim Collins, author of Good to Great

Kammok Hammock A fellow Certified B Corp - Located in sunny Austin, Texas, Kammok is an outdoor company focused on high performance gear for hammock camping. Texas tough and featherlight, Kammok gear is designed for backpackers, travelers, and campers who want comfort without the weight. From hammocks to sleeping bags, tents to trail quilts, Kammok gear is built to outlast your wildest endeavors and covered by a lifetime guarantee. As a 1% for the Planet company, Kammok gives one percent of annual revenue to Explore Austin, a nonprofit providing outdoor education, leadership training, and mentorship to youth.
 
The Kammok Roo™ is a high-performance camping hammock designed to provide you with an exceptional outdoor experience. The 2016 Roo is tear resistant, incredibly comfortable, and built to last a lifetime. Includes Python Straps, full strength climbing 'biners and a stuff sack. Roo is perfect for two!
     
B Corp – “Be Your Best” Gear – Patagonia, Prana + POLYN B Corps Patagonia and Prana are two brands synonymous with care, intention, and adventure. They have been our inspiration in getting our B Corp certification, and no doubt have inspired many of you. We decided to put together a bundle with gift certificates from both of them so you can buy apparel and gear to feel good and achieve your potential. Also included is a copy of the recent republished “Let My People Go Surfing by Patagonia founder Yvon Chinouard. 

Wimberley Wine Tour & Custom Lab Skin Care Consulting Wimberley is located in the heart of the Texas Hill Country, between Austin and San Antonio. The center of Wimberley is situated at the confluence of Cypress Creek and the Blanco River, amid bluebonnets, wineries and Cypress trees. We will treat you to a day with Polly to tour SKINourishment, hear the origin story first hand, learn some – do-it-yourself tricks, and share your personal needs with her. The team will take you to a winery and share the music of the Hill Country.

Climbing with Tommy Caldwell Tommy Caldwell is a legendary American rock climber, SKINourishment climbOn customer, supporter and dear friend. He made first ascents (FA) of some of the United States' hardest sport routes (as of 2008) including Kryptonite (5.14c/d) and Flex Luthor (a possible 5.15a) at the Fortress of Solitude, Colorado. In January 2015, Caldwell completed the first-ever free climb of the Dawn Wall of El Capitan in Yosemite National Park. To complete this historic climb, SKINourishment overnighted him climbOn Bar, Creme, and crossFIXE MUSCLE paste. These products helped his skin heal quickly and kept him on the rock. To support Polly and his friends at SKINourishment, Tommy is making himself available for a day of climbing. He will share his love for the products along with stories from his new book, THE PUSH, and hours of excitement climbing.
The Impact Your Purchase MakesYour contribution is valuable to us and will help in the following meaningful ways:

A pioneering woman entrepreneur will get the chance to thrive and grow organically  as the ‘natural skin care industry’ competition heats up and we as consumers demand non-toxic, cruelty-free products 

Improve the quality of lives through our customers, employees, and suppliers,   

Provide better alternatives to retailers, by showcasing that 100% plant-based, Made in U.S.A. skin care is available, incredible and affordable AND that 99% natural is not good enough.
Track-Record of Success While our vision of ourselves is new and the opportunity is now, we have been in business for years. So you will get your Perks, and your contribution will accelerate our results and increase our positive impacts.

We have been in business 20 years. Our products are used by the #1 climber in the world, hundreds of elite athletes, and hard-working people. We are ready to ramp our business to be a destination for natural beauty lovers seeking 100% plant-based, really natural products.

Great people make our skin care products by hand every week in Wimberley, Texas. We have built a production plan to scale-up our operations by three to four times. We hope to increase the job opportunity for our part-time team members and employ more production, warehouse and sales team members.

We ship to more than 30 countries and hundreds of retailers and distributors. We understand the requirements to meet the strictest European standards and retailer requirements. We are excited to ship our great products to you.
Love Letters - Our products in Action Molly Mitchell on SKINourishment Jonathan Siegrist on climbOn SPF 30 Mineral Sunscreen Amanda Allen, What's in your bag?
Doctor Heather Weidner on climbOn Creme
Jonathan Siegrist on climbOn BarOur Team  Polly Glasse - Founder & Creator Theresa Wall - Production Lead Cristi Cooksey - Production Assistant Paul Glasse - Head of Logistics Will Reynolds Young - Chief Digital Officer Denise James - Sales Lead Geoff Cline - Advisor & Legal Counsel Amy George - Advisor Risks & ChallengesOur mission to deliver good in the world has been at the core of our company from inception. To underscore that, we recently became a certified B Corp. We carry as our values – trust, transparency, and integrity. We have delivered on our promise for over twenty years. We are excited to deliver great products and perks to you via this campaign. However, if demand outstrips supply, or we have unanticipated issues or delays, we promise transparency and integrity to come to a prompt resolution that works for everyone concerned.Other Ways You Can HelpWe understand not everyone can contribute financially; we invite you to share our story with your friends.  Here are some ways you can help:
Share our link to our campaign via Facebook, email, Twitter http://bit.ly/POLYN

Share our campaign hashtag # SKINLOVESPLANTS
Join our email newsletter

story:
Dear friends and family,

Greetings, and thank you in advance for reading. 

I know how I would like to transform my business and need support from someone who can help me get there. A Houston-based practitioner, Chris Axelrad offers a 12-month Chinese medical business model program based on his own experiences and success in building three separate acupuncture practices.The total cost of the business model program is $5,600, 

I am raising $5.600 not only to help me arrive at the next stage of my professional life, but also to increase my ability to be of service to those in need.

 

About Me

As an acupuncture physician, my heart has been in working with moms, children and families. Being a mother of two small boys, I feel a deep affinity to serve these populations due to my own challenges, heartaches and experiences in motherhood. Since graduating from acupuncture and Chinese medical school in 2012, my husband has been the main provider for our family, while I have been a full-time mama. During that time, I have been fortunate to maintain a modest, very part time, acupuncture practice. I am ready to grow my own business in a way that will improve our family’s quality of life and allow me to continue cultivating the purpose and drive I have for being of service to mothers and children while continuing to care for my two boys. At this time, my husband and I do not have access to the financial means, including loans, that will support this venture.

What I Will Create

The business model and CEU programs will enable me to:

- Implement a highly efficient and professional system medically, structurally, and financially

- Understand how to create an inspiring advertising message and market myself efficiently and effectively with minimal costs 

- Refine my message and position of authority in the medicine

- Enhance my website to reflect these changes

- Fully step into and embrace the confident and powerful physician that I am 

 

How We Will Transform Our Community Together 

I am committed to completing this program for myself and the community I serve. I intend to help transform our community by:

 

- Increasing awareness about the benefits of acupuncture and Chinese medicine to an entire family's physical and emotional health

- Empowering and offering women the tools to care for themselves during and after pregnancy

- Supporting pregnant mothers through the most challenging phases of pregnancy, both physical and emotional

- Supporting optimal health for mother and baby throughout pregnancy

- Supporting mothers postpartum, both physically and psychologically (postpartum depression)

- Teaching the community about the power of Chinese medicine to help heal childhood illness and disease

- Empowering parents with the tools to help provide care for their children when they are ill

- Helping people find a way out of long-term chronic illness or pain 

 

With Deepest Gratitude

Thank you for taking the time to listen to me. It is not easy for me to ask for help and financial support, and yet, at the same time, I feel a deep force in my heart pushing me to do this for my family, myself and my community.

If you feel inspired and are willing and available to give at this time, we would be deeply grateful for your support and encouragement. Any amount of money will help me transform my practice and enhance our already blessed family experience.

story:
The Birth of a Doula

A Birth Doula supports women as they navigate pregnancy, birth, and life with a newborn baby. 

The word Doula in ancient Greek means “a woman who serves,” She is a trained professional who gives continuous physical (non-medical), emotional and informational support to expectant parents, laboring mamas, and postpartum families.  A Birth Doula helps mamas have a positive and safe birth experience. During the months before birth, a Doula can help you create a birth plan that’s right for you. During labor she will advocate for you and help the rest of your team follow your birth plan, whatever you choose it to be. A doula is helpful during a home birth, birth at a birth center, or in birth at a hospital. She may be especially helpful if you want to labor in the hospital where you’re unlikely to have a close relationship with your medical team.  Having a doula on your team can help your birth story be one you remember with great joy.

Pregnancy and birth are powerful times of self growth, self realization, and transformation. With the birth of a baby, comes the birth of a mother and the birth of a family as well.  It is my passion to support women as they travel through the powerful portal of pregnancy and birth and use the energy created there to become powerful, peaceful, purposeful mothers.

The spirit of the pregnancy and the birth echoes a thousand times over in this lifetime and in generations to come. Birth has the power to change lives. It is a deeply transformational experience. One that touches the unknown and connects us with our life force. Birth is natural and normal, safe and divine. It has the potential to be deeply nourishing, life affirming, and beautiful. 

I have learned so much about pregnancy and birth through my own experience giving birth to my son. I am still integrating the beauty and energy of my pregnancy and birth. I am healing personal trauma, I am clearing family karma, I am understanding the power and beauty of my body on a whole new level. I am becoming a mother, more and more every day. I am reaching new levels of love and understanding through my relationship with my son. My life is alive and bathed in light in a way it has never been before. My powers of abundance and manifestation are heightened and my intuition is off the charts! Pregnancy and birth were the most powerful experiences of growth and transformation I have ever experienced. I am inspired to learn everything I can about this powerful and sacred window of time in a woman's life and become a birth doula to support women in making the most of this precious time in their own lives. 

 

 

The Impact

Birth work is so incredibly powerful. How a mother gives birth and how a baby enters the world will ripple out exponentially into the rest of society for this life and lifetimes to come! Your support for my education means all of the mothers and children I will help in birth will have the resources to  become peaceful, powerful, purposeful people who can save the world! I am incredibly passionate about this topic. This is my life's work and I am so thrilled to step into my first professional role in the birth world! Your support makes it possible for me to really devote the proper amount of time and space to my birthwork education.  I'm ready to devote myself to this important work and bring it back to you, my community!

One reason I've chosen to use a crowdfunding campaign is that I'm curious if you want me to do this work. Do you see me as a birth doula? Do you see me as YOUR birth doula? Becoming a doula is a choice to serve my community in a new way. Your support to help fund my education is your vote to see me choose birth work and devote myself to this path. Thank you for considering investing in my future and yours!  By hiring me now to be your Birth Doula in the future, you create space in my life for me to dedicate my time to my education and become the best Birth Doula I can possibly be! 

If you are not in need of a Birth Doula in the future, but you still support me in this important work, I'm offering a special collection of Moonspun Jewelry inspired by the sacred Yoni in exchange for your contribution to my Doula education.  There's also a beautiful little Moon notecard option which is an easy and affordable way to support my work and get a beautiful little treat for yourself or someone you love. If you don't need a future Birth Doula, but you know someone who does, please feel free to pass along this invitation.

 

 

The Prizes!

Your generosity will be rewarded with some sweet perks! In exchange for your support, I am offering my future Birth Doula services. I am also offering a special collection of Moonspun Jewelry inspired by the Yoni. The Golden Yonis are symbols of your feminine source power and serve as daily reminders of your connection to the universe. The Sanskrit word Yoni translates to womb, uterus, vagina, or source. It is a stylised representation of female genitalia representing the goddess Shakti and the feminine flow of energy.  I also have the original Moonspun Moon by Ali Davis available as beautiful little Moon note cards. Celebrate women and magic and all that is good with one of a kind jewelry pieces by Katherine Sanz (Moonspun Jewelry) and Original artwork by Ali Davis. 

 

Featured Perk! I will be your Birth Doula!

If you choose this perk, you will have me with all my fresh new doula skills as your future Birth Doula!!! I'll be ready for you beginning June 2018 $2222 

 

Moon Cards 

Moon note cards original art by Ali Davis blank inside with envelope. three for $22 or ten for $55+ shipping 

 

Tiny Moon Ring 

A tiny silver moon on a tiny golden ring by Moonspun Jewelry Flash Sale! $20 + free shipping in the US!

 

Hot Pink and Rosewood Mala

 A hot pink and rosewood mala hand knotted with love by Moonspun Jewelry. $77 + shipping


 

Golden Yoni Bracelet

A golden yoni bracelet by Moonspun Jewelry. $88 + shipping

 

Golden Yoni Necklace

Teeny Golden Yoni on a 16" golden chain necklace by Moonspun Jewelry. $99 + shipping


Golden Yoni Earrings

Golden Yoni Stud earrings by Moonspun Jewelry. $111 + shipping

 

Golden Bangles

Golden bangles handmade by Moonspun Jewelry  1 for $123 or 3 for $300 + shipping

 

Custom Golden Yoni Necklace

A custom golden yoni created just for you by Moonspun Jewelry. I'll work with you to create a One of a Kind Yoni power piece. Example pictured $333 and above + shipping

 

The Yoniverse Necklace

A baller One of a Kind Golden Yoni necklace wrapped in gold, raw diamonds, and black sapphires on a long golden chain. $1111 + shipping

 

Custom Solid Gold Yoni Necklace

I'll work with you to create a One of Kind Solid Gold Yoni power piece necklace using fine materials like solid gold and precious gemstones. $3333 and Up + shipping

 

Full funder Prize!

If You are the full funder of my birth doula education, I LOVE You! I could create a fabulous piece of jewelry for you using the finest materials on earth! I could bake you a magical chocolate cake! I could throw you a rainbow unicorn parade! Heck, I could even be your Birth Doula! I could do anything for You! If this is You, let's talk. Choose anything! $22222

 

You can donate any amount.  If you would rather just contribute and not receive any goods in exchange, just choose No perks when checking out.

 

The Investment in my Birth Doula education

Here's the cost of my education, broken down so you can see specifically where your contribution will go:

Doula training course from Doula Trainings International $1597 + Course books $180 + Doula Training International Membership fee $157 + Childcare for my son during the training $640 + Birth support for three families as a doula in training $1200 + 16 hours of postpartum support for two families as a doula in training $640 + Childbirth education course $400 + Breastfeeding class $150 + CPR certification $100 + Childcare for my son while I complete the course requirements $9200 = Total cost of Birth doula education $14,264

+

Push goal! Doula training retreat! One Doula Retreat from Doula Trainings international $2400 + Airfare $500 + Childcare for my son while I attend the training $1250 = Total cost of bonus $4,150

+

Push goal! Postpartum Doula training with The Matrona $495 + Childcare for Ocean while I attend the training $1090 = Total cost of Postpartum addition $1,585

__________________________________________

Total Goal:: including the training and retreat $19,999

+ Indiegogo and Credit Card Fees $2,223

$22,222

+ shipping

 

The total cost of my birth doula education alone is all I'll need to become a certified professional birth doula. The first Push goal is for an optional Doula retreat where I'll get to learn more skills for birth, dive more in depth with with my community of professional doulas, and celebrate my new path! I don't necessarily need to attend the retreat, but I really want to!! The second Push goal is an additional postpartum doula training led by an elder midwife, The Matrona. This will be a potent spiritual workshop which will complement my official training.

I appreciate your contribution to my education!  If 10 people hire me to be their future Doula, My education will be totally funded. If 1,000 people order moon note cards, that works too. It will probably be some combination of prizes. Every little bit helps! If I don't receive the whole goal amount from my community, I'll be funding my education on my own. 

If I raise more than I need, the extra funds will go to Planned Parenthood.

Since becoming a mother, my time has become extra precious. Just another way motherhood is a great clarifier. This is why your support means so much to me.  It's a little scary stepping into a brand new profession, especially because I already have a successful jewelry business. Yet, I must follow my truth and passion. And so, into the great unknown I leap!! I know whatever challenges I encounter along the way will become my teachers as I become the best birth doula I can possibly be!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute actual money at this time, I understand. Your emotional support and sharing this campaign with your community means so much to me! If you already have a friendship with Ocean, volunteering to spend quality time with him while I work towards my education is also appreciated. 

Thank You!!!!
