story:
Our New Location!

   The purpose of this fundraiser is not to expand the business, but to extend our outreach into the community.  The core of our mission is to be a build an oasis of love and care. We envision a place that will feed you with the highest quality food, provide the best in alternative health care and awaken you to something greater within yourself.  Additionally, we plan to build an institute offering more courses which foster community, connectivity, health, leadership and principles for living a fulfilling life.

   In order to realize this goal, we are asking for your support! Building this level of community takes more than good intentions. It requires intentional investment from everyone who believes in the big-picture vision we’re holding. By making a contribution, you will not only receive a gift that will support your well-being but also  help us to create a place that will nourish, revive and support many people in feeling more empowered in their lives.

   We have an enormous vision of creating a welcoming place; a place where people want to belong, not just join; a place where no one is just a 'visitor'. The new Nourishing Journey Wellness Center and Cafe will center around you, a valued member of our community.

   The majority of the funds we raise will go towards the new organic café and the new education space. Some of the expenses associated with this level of expansion are

  • Architect and design blueprints 
  • Licensing and permits
  • Kitchen equipment
  • Training room equipment
  • Plumbing and fixtures
  • Building Contractor fees 
  • Demolition and Construction (flooring, walls, heating, etc.)

If you would simply like to support us, but don't necessarily want a perk, just click the dark pink "Back It" button above and choose the amount to give. Otherwise, keep reading!   

 If you are not able to donate at this time, but you're nevertheless excited to support our growth and expansion, please share this campaign with as many people as possible among your community, family, and friends.

And, of course, if you have any questions, please feel free to call us at 1-410-992-3001.

 

Wellness Is a Journey

   We all have our own individual challenges when it comes to our health and well-being.  Whether you are an avid natural health adventurer or just starting to see the potential benefits, there will always be a path in front of you. How you travel down that path is a decision, a choice. No matter where you are in your journey, the choice to live a vibrant life is only and always one step away.

   Our new motto: Healing Bodies- the physical aspect; Opening Minds- realizing what it means to be well and the possibilities for achieving that; Uniting Hearts- coming together to discover what really resonates among us all. What makes Nourishing Journey so unique is that we offer tri-level healing for body, mind and spirit all in one place. We work with our clients from a truly holistic approach - we care about the whole person.

We look forward to welcoming you into our beautiful new space this spring, together we can share greater love, joy, and peace!

 

Here's What We Are Changing

       We have a small event room at our current location, but we want to offer more opportunities for our clients, their families and friends, and the local community at large to come in and learn  how to take better care of themselves.

       The new space will have two event rooms- one for intimate gatherings like meditation or intuitive readings, the other large enough for energy healing certification courses or training seminars. Some of the things we will host are yoga, meditation classes, health and wellness panel discussions with an integrative medical doctor, cooking classes, essential oils workshops and even leadership development courses.

     

     

       Our current lounge area is really not ideal- it's upstairs next to the quiet treatment rooms. With the new organic café, we'll have a wide open space near the entrance with tables and chairs, including a workbench with laptop outlets. There aren’t that many choices in Howard County for good, healthy, wholesome food. We plan to offer another option for people to swing by on their way to work, or come and sit down for a cup of Bulletproof coffee or herbal tea, enjoy a light meal, and relax in good company.

     

      

    We Want to Reward Your Generosity

       We want to add real value to what our backers are investing in us, so we've put together exclusive service packages only available via this campaign. We want you to feel like you’re donating to a really great cause but also getting the opportunity to try some services that are new to you and see how they can benefit your overall wellness.

       The perks available to you through this crowdfund campaign were designed to offer some of the services you already love while introducing you to some services you've never tried. (Packages can also be purchased as gifts for someone else, but are not transferable to another name.)  Here are a few examples:

    The Journey 180 is the best value by far. With this six month membership perk, you'll enjoy 180 minutes of service every month - a 30 minute, a 60 minute and a 90 minute- plus get a bonus 15 minute service and your choice of a free Bulletproof coffee or Guilford Smoothie, and save $90 per month in the bargain.

    The Circle of Wellness let you sample up to 100 minutes of services before you book a full treatment. Try a series of five different 20 minute services for yourself, or consider offering this to someone as a great gift.

    The Guilford Experience is like a box of chocolates- you get your favorites along with some you may have wondered about. You get to experience six 60 minutes sessions, plus enjoy a bonus ionic footbath treatment.

     

    Our Intended Impact

       Our hope is that the new Nourishing Journey Wellness Center is going to have a powerful impact on the community and help as many people as we can. 

       We’re all trying to find our way to being happy and healthy and joyous and connected at the heart. It’s so hard to do that sometimes. So the big vision Nourishing Journey is to support and grow a community with healing and wellness and spiritual connection; to bring people together and get back to loving each other again. We want you to feel a part of us; to feel welcome and at home.

    The Risks and Challenges

       Our risk is actually minimal- we have secured a bank loan for part of the expenses and we will be moving into the newer, larger and expansive space no matter what. The challenge comes in how available funds influence decisions regarding how the space is designed, constructed and utilized.  Not reaching our goal may, naturally, mean making compromises, therefore, the cafe might be delayed until much later in the year.

     

     

    Some Of Our Successes

       “The atmosphere was very peaceful. The practitioner was Very knowledgeable and eager to assist. Family owned business….very intimate (personal) setting. You definitely get the impression of they love what the do and put a lot of energy into the business. The offer a wide variety of services and seem very dedicated to wellness. I would highly recommend Nourishing Journey to anyone and will definitely go back.”

       “Nourishing Journey is an oasis of hope moving through a period of incredible transformations and upheaval in the world. It’s become the spiritual hub for the state of Maryland and is constantly growing. There are a large variety of events, classes and meditations constantly being offered. There are a whole host of incredibly talented energy healers who all compliment each other, and on top of that it’s also a detox center. Jenn, the owner, and all of the people who work at NJ are some of the most admirable, hospitable, and down-to-earth people you’ll ever meet. Nourishing Journey has been a cornerstone in my life for the past year and been an invaluable and irreplaceable place during a time of major transformation for me, and I know there are many others who can say the same."

       “I want to be perfectly honest—I don’t know what I (or my entire family for that matter) would have done without Jenn Palmer.  She is the soul of compassion, wisdom, integrity and so much more.  Jenn’s combination of compassion along with her energy sensing/healing abilities (which are huge) is awesome, amazing and profound.  Her energy sessions have helped me not only heal physically but also emotionally and spiritually.  When there were periods of storms going on in my life recently, Jenn was there to help me make sense of it all and helped me to actually heal and grow as a person.  My entire family now goes to Jenn, and I even recommended her to my mom-in-law!  And my mom-in-law couldn’t stop singing her praises once she went to her.  Jenn is quite simply, the best!!!”
story_txt:
Our New Location!

   The purpose of this fundraiser is not to expand the business, but to extend our outreach into the community.  The core of our mission is to be a build an oasis of love and care. We envision a place that will feed you with the highest quality food, provide the best in alternative health care and awaken you to something greater within yourself.  Additionally, we plan to build an institute offering more courses which foster community, connectivity, health, leadership and principles for living a fulfilling life.
   In order to realize this goal, we are asking for your support! Building this level of community takes more than good intentions. It requires intentional investment from everyone who believes in the big-picture vision we’re holding. By making a contribution, you will not only receive a gift that will support your well-being but also  help us to create a place that will nourish, revive and support many people in feeling more empowered in their lives.
   We have an enormous vision of creating a welcoming place; a place where people want to belong, not just join; a place where no one is just a 'visitor'. The new Nourishing Journey Wellness Center and Cafe will center around you, a valued member of our community.
   The majority of the funds we raise will go towards the new organic café and the new education space. Some of the expenses associated with this level of expansion are

Architect and design blueprints 
Licensing and permits
Kitchen equipment
Training room equipment

Plumbing and fixtures

Building Contractor fees 
Demolition and Construction (flooring, walls, heating, etc.)

If you would simply like to support us, but don't necessarily want a perk, just click the dark pink "Back It" button above and choose the amount to give. Otherwise, keep reading!   
 If you are not able to donate at this time, but you're nevertheless excited to support our growth and expansion, please share this campaign with as many people as possible among your community, family, and friends.
And, of course, if you have any questions, please feel free to call us at 1-410-992-3001.
 
Wellness Is a Journey

   We all have our own individual challenges when it comes to our health and well-being.  Whether you are an avid natural health adventurer or just starting to see the potential benefits, there will always be a path in front of you. How you travel down that path is a decision, a choice. No matter where you are in your journey, the choice to live a vibrant life is only and always one step away.
   Our new motto: Healing Bodies- the physical aspect; Opening Minds- realizing what it means to be well and the possibilities for achieving that; Uniting Hearts- coming together to discover what really resonates among us all. What makes Nourishing Journey so unique is that we offer tri-level healing for body, mind and spirit all in one place. We work with our clients from a truly holistic approach - we care about the whole person.
We look forward to welcoming you into our beautiful new space this spring, together we can share greater love, joy, and peace!
 

Here's What We Are Changing


   We have a small event room at our current location, but we want to offer more opportunities for our clients, their families and friends, and the local community at large to come in and learn  how to take better care of themselves.
   The new space will have two event rooms- one for intimate gatherings like meditation or intuitive readings, the other large enough for energy healing certification courses or training seminars. Some of the things we will host are yoga, meditation classes, health and wellness panel discussions with an integrative medical doctor, cooking classes, essential oils workshops and even leadership development courses.
 

 
   Our current lounge area is really not ideal- it's upstairs next to the quiet treatment rooms. With the new organic café, we'll have a wide open space near the entrance with tables and chairs, including a workbench with laptop outlets. There aren’t that many choices in Howard County for good, healthy, wholesome food. We plan to offer another option for people to swing by on their way to work, or come and sit down for a cup of Bulletproof coffee or herbal tea, enjoy a light meal, and relax in good company.
 


  
We Want to Reward Your Generosity
   We want to add real value to what our backers are investing in us, so we've put together exclusive service packages only available via this campaign. We want you to feel like you’re donating to a really great cause but also getting the opportunity to try some services that are new to you and see how they can benefit your overall wellness.
   The perks available to you through this crowdfund campaign were designed to offer some of the services you already love while introducing you to some services you've never tried. (Packages can also be purchased as gifts for someone else, but are not transferable to another name.)  Here are a few examples:
The Journey 180 is the best value by far. With this six month membership perk, you'll enjoy 180 minutes of service every month - a 30 minute, a 60 minute and a 90 minute- plus get a bonus 15 minute service and your choice of a free Bulletproof coffee or Guilford Smoothie, and save $90 per month in the bargain.
The Circle of Wellness let you sample up to 100 minutes of services before you book a full treatment. Try a series of five different 20 minute services for yourself, or consider offering this to someone as a great gift.
The Guilford Experience is like a box of chocolates- you get your favorites along with some you may have wondered about. You get to experience six 60 minutes sessions, plus enjoy a bonus ionic footbath treatment.

 

Our Intended Impact
   Our hope is that the new Nourishing Journey Wellness Center is going to have a powerful impact on the community and help as many people as we can. 
   We’re all trying to find our way to being happy and healthy and joyous and connected at the heart. It’s so hard to do that sometimes. So the big vision Nourishing Journey is to support and grow a community with healing and wellness and spiritual connection; to bring people together and get back to loving each other again. We want you to feel a part of us; to feel welcome and at home.
The Risks and Challenges
   Our risk is actually minimal- we have secured a bank loan for part of the expenses and we will be moving into the newer, larger and expansive space no matter what. The challenge comes in how available funds influence decisions regarding how the space is designed, constructed and utilized.  Not reaching our goal may, naturally, mean making compromises, therefore, the cafe might be delayed until much later in the year.
 

 
Some Of Our Successes
   “The atmosphere was very peaceful. The practitioner was Very knowledgeable and eager to assist. Family owned business….very intimate (personal) setting. You definitely get the impression of they love what the do and put a lot of energy into the business. The offer a wide variety of services and seem very dedicated to wellness. I would highly recommend Nourishing Journey to anyone and will definitely go back.”
   “Nourishing Journey is an oasis of hope moving through a period of incredible transformations and upheaval in the world. It’s become the spiritual hub for the state of Maryland and is constantly growing. There are a large variety of events, classes and meditations constantly being offered. There are a whole host of incredibly talented energy healers who all compliment each other, and on top of that it’s also a detox center. Jenn, the owner, and all of the people who work at NJ are some of the most admirable, hospitable, and down-to-earth people you’ll ever meet. Nourishing Journey has been a cornerstone in my life for the past year and been an invaluable and irreplaceable place during a time of major transformation for me, and I know there are many others who can say the same."
   “I want to be perfectly honest—I don’t know what I (or my entire family for that matter) would have done without Jenn Palmer.  She is the soul of compassion, wisdom, integrity and so much more.  Jenn’s combination of compassion along with her energy sensing/healing abilities (which are huge) is awesome, amazing and profound.  Her energy sessions have helped me not only heal physically but also emotionally and spiritually.  When there were periods of storms going on in my life recently, Jenn was there to help me make sense of it all and helped me to actually heal and grow as a person.  My entire family now goes to Jenn, and I even recommended her to my mom-in-law!  And my mom-in-law couldn’t stop singing her praises once she went to her.  Jenn is quite simply, the best!!!”

story:
*** Updated perks with shipping included!

MY STORY - I aim to EMPOWER you to pursue your passion and INSPIRE you to follow your dreams.  It's never too late to take control of your health and nutrition!

I chose the word 'Auka' which means "to-enhance" in Icelandic because I created AukaLife to ENHANCE the nutritional value of your meals. I am a huge fan of using superfoods to keep your body healthy and happy, but it takes time to understand the benefits of each one and how to use them. AukaLife provides NUTRIENT-RICH, ORGANIC superfood blends boost your meals - and overall enhance your life!

There's a lot of misinformation out there and what we put into our bodies truly impacts our happiness =D AukaLife takes away the hassle of understanding which superfoods are best for you by combining a few targeted, effective, and natural ingredients.

I've done the research and mixing for you! 4 products below contain only these ingredients:

DETOX - moringa, matcha, spirulina, wheatgrass, barley grass, flaxseed

ENERGY - maca, bee pollen, flaxseed, coconut palm

RECOVERY - cacao, pea protein, hemp protein, maca, walnut

ANTIOXIDANT - acai powder, goji powder, turmeric, chia seeds, beet root powder, camu camu

 

The top 3 reasons why I truly believe in AukaLife blends:

Convenient: AukaLife comes in single-serving 'travel' size packages when you're on-the-go as well as larger bulk packages to easily add to your smoothies with a single scoop.

Organic: Ingredients are high quality, all-natural, non GMO & (of course!) organic. Nothing that sounds like it was manufactured or synthesized in a lab.

Delicious: Recipes have been carefully designed to not only maximize benefits, but taste good!

 

WHAT ARE SUPERFOODS?

FLAXSEEDS · CHIA SEEDS · HEMP SEEDS · MACA · AÇAÍ · MORINGA · WHEATGRASS · BEE POLLEN · COCONUT PALM · CACAO · BEET ROOT · GOJI BERRY · PEA PROTEIN · SPIRULINA · TURMERIC · CAMU · GINGER · BARLEY GRASS

Superfoods are nutrient dense roots, seeds or plants full of vitamins and minerals your body craves. Each ingredient comes from the earth and has been used for their healing and medicinal benefits for hundreds of years. Superfoods are known to:

  • Aid digestion
  • Fight cancer
  • Fight heart disease
  • Protect organs from toxins
  • Lower cholesterol
  • Regulate metabolism
  • Reduce inflammation in the body
  • Healthier, smoother, stronger skin

We've made it easy to add to your juice, smoothie or tea, or sprinkle on your breakfast bowl, overnight oats, soup or salad! (I've even mixed into my beer for an extra boost of vitamins :-o)

WHAT WE NEED & WHERE THE $$ IS GOING

I have spent the past 2 years researching and perfecting my recipes and now I'm asking for $20,000 for my first bulk manufacturing run.

  • Pre-Orders for 10,000 units
  • Manufacturing Minimums (using all-natural, premium, organic ingredients!)
  • Packaging, Labeling, Distributing
  • Marketing and PR
  • Samples

FOR YOU!

  • $20 -- 1 of each (4) Single-Serving Aukalife Packet
  • $35 -- 10 Single-Serving AukaLife of your choice (30% discount/retail at $5)!
  • $60 -- 20 Single-Serving AukaLife of your choice (40% discount/retail at $5)!
  • $40 -- 1 bulk month supply pouch (10oz) of AukaLife flavor of your choice (30% discount!)
  • $100 -- 2 bulk month supply pouch (10oz) + 10 single-serving packets (40% discount!)
  • $250 -- 10 AukaLife single-serving packets + 6 month supply (bulk pouch delivered monthly) of 1 AukaLife flavor of your choice + 2 post-launch party tickets (30% discount!)
  • $500 -- 20 AukaLife single-serving packets + 1 year supply (bulk pouch delivered monthly) of 1 AukaLife flavor of your choice + 4 post-launch party tickets (30% discount!)

 

THE WHY

Currently you can find AukaLife products in a few local juice bars, but we want to spread the LOVE throughout the COUNTRY! 

  • My goal is to spread wellness EDUCATION and AWARENESS to local and global communities about the benefits of eating more plants & seeds
  • I aim to show you the HEALING and DETOXIFYING benefits of natural plant life, so that you can overcome your biggest health obstacles, and live a happy life.
  • But most importantly BE HAPPY! And do what makes you and your body happy. If you need to eat a tub of ice cream because you had a sh*tty day - do it! If you haven't been to the gym in a month and too exhausted to fit it into your schedule, it's ok. I want to be an example for young female entrepreneurs everywhere that you can do anything you put your mind to, and it's ok if you stumble along the way. We have 1 life to live, so MAKE IT COUNT!

CHALLENGES

My 2 biggest challenges are:

  • Minimum quantities required for bulk manufacturing are very high, especially with a single serving product, so the upfront costs are steep. This is why we need YOUR help to raise $ for pre-orders to get 10,000 units made.
  • The health supplements market is very saturated with tons of similar products, but I have spoken to nutrition experts, personal trainers, and health doctors who believe I have created a simple, effective product that my target market will really love. I have partnered with wellness bloggers and influencers who support my product and are helping me promote it.

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

If you're unable to contribute financially, help us spread the word!

  • Share the campaign with your network and community! Use this link (https://igg.me/at/AukaLife) to share on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, email, etc! & tag @aukalife on social media so I can send you some <3
  • Reach out to your local businesses that you want to see carry AukaLife (juice bars, gyms, health stores, etc.) and email aukalife.igg@gmail.com
  • Connect with me - I'd love to hear from you and any ideas you have for growing AukaLife.
  • Follow me on social media and sign up for updates on AukaLife!

Thank YOU for all your love and support!

-Lauren, Founder of AukaLife

Follow me on social media and sign up for updates on AukaLife!

Thank YOU for all your love and support!
-Lauren, Founder of AukaLife

story:
Since I was little, I have been always passionate about humanity, consciousness, evolution and spirituality. This passion led me to embrace this as a mission to help others to align with their true selves and discover their uniqueness. As and adult, I immersed myself in channeling activities and meditation practices and with the support of the messages I receive, I've been helping others to learn and discover amazing things within themselves that truly transform their lives!

Why do I care so much about meditation?

Because when we learn to settle down our minds, we can connect with higher levels of energy and our higher selves, find peace, bright our lives and emanate love; and when we do that, we are helping the world.

When each of us stop looking outside for things to fulfill ourselves, we raise our vibration and all our environment receive what we are spreading;  we are not just helping ourselves... We are helping all the people who cross our path and this is a very positive impact on our world. 

And while many of you reading this may have an interest in this topic, there are millions of individuals there who are desperately looking for solutions to find inner peace and change their lives and most of the times they can't find them because what they need is to remember who they really are and start getting answers from their inside.

Nowadays, people are desperately trying to understand life, but what they need to do is to connect with their inner power, and the best way is through meditation. 

That's why I Am asking for your help.

With your donations, we will be developing a meditation app called I AM MEDITATION! where I will be uploading hundreds of different channeled guided meditations for people to work on all the different topics any human being can be concerned about.

Together we're going to raise $6,500 to develop the I AM MEDITATION app, which will be free to download and will contain a bunch of free guided meditations. It will also have a membership area for a very affordable price; this cost will be covering the monthly maintenance and equipment we need to keep uploading more material and covering the operation costs. 

I have been practicing meditation for many years and also teaching to my clients this practice with amazing results and a positive transformation to their lives and the people who surround them.

Creating this app we'll be helping millions of people to learn how to meditate in an easy and comfortable way.  Having access to this creation is like having a private meditation master with you every day, everywhere.

This fundraiser isn't like many you've seen before.  There are two things that make this one different (and even more beneficial for you!)... 

1. When you donate at certain levels you'll get access to my best creations, favorite private programs, and more. 

Every penny we earn here will be used in the creation of the I AM MEDITATION app and to buy new equipment to continue creating high quality material.  You can get access to my most popular products and your money will benefit an incredible cause.

2. You will be helping independent individuals, not the big companies.

We are hiring young, enthusiastic and aware people who will love to have a chance to show their great abilities and move forward to help their families to succeed. 

This means that you can get some of my best programs, knowing that you will be helping young people who need a chance and, at the same time, you will be helping millions of people to transform their lives.  Amazing, right? 

Ready to support? Take a look at the different donation levels on the right-hand side of this page. Each level is stacked, so if you donate $50, for example, you'll also get the prizes for the $25 and $10 levels, too. The more you donate, the more you get.

Have questions about this fundraiser or any of the prizes? Email us at info@carmenvasquez.net and we'll respond ASAP.

Please note: We won't be able to offer refunds for any contribution made here, as your payment will be considered a donation and will go directly to the creation of the I AM MEDITATION app. Thank you so much for supporting this incredible project!

THERE IS A TRANSFORMATIONAL POWER THAT LIES WITHIN ALL OF US; GO ON A MAGICAL JOURNEY TO DISCOVER AND AWAKE YOUR OWN INNER POWER THROUGH MEDITATION!

Carmen V.

story:
We are Amy and Hannah, two moms and passionate entrepreneurs that own MOGA (www.mogsmoms.com). After 3 years of working together, we realized that we both struggled with postpartum mental health challenges and we had never talked about it before.

We are on a mission to end the silence and stigma around perinatal mood and anxiety disorders. We want women to feel supported as new moms and not alone navigating their journey through motherhood.

We are committed to donating this program to organizations across Canada and the U.S. who have clients that might benefit from Birth Your Power ™. 

DID YOU KNOW?

  •  80% of Women Experience Postpartum Blues
  •  3-5% of Women Experience Postpartum Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder
  •  1 / 7 Women Experience Postpartum Depression

* If women do seek help, there are limited resources available to support them. They are often faced with waitlists, financial barriers, or additional obstacles to access the help they need.

* Women suffering from postpartum mental health disorders often don't want to leave the house and interact with others, therefore this program is 100% online. 

What We Need & What You Get:

* We need to build a website and online tools that new moms will find easy to navigate. 

* We need to film and edit the 12-Step Program with industry experts. 

* We need an Educational Fund to Raise Awareness around Birth Your Power ™.

* For every donation, you will get our 12-Step Birth Your Power™ Program. You can keep it for yourself, or gift it to a mom in need. 

* Every person that donates has the option to email us a photo of themselves to go on the new website, under "Community / Supporters ."

* If you donate more than $75, we will give you a shout out on our @moga_moms and @birthyourpower Instagram stories. 

The Impact:

  • Destigmatize postpartum mental health. 
  • Help moms feel like herself again, regain strength, energy, joy and hope. 

Help us launch Birth Your Power™  by January 2019! 

In gratitude, 

Hannah & Amy

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you are unable to contribute, please share our campaign. It reminds moms that they are not alone.
story_txt:
We are Amy and Hannah, two moms and passionate entrepreneurs that own MOGA (www.mogsmoms.com). After 3 years of working together, we realized that we both struggled with postpartum mental health challenges and we had never talked about it before.
We are on a mission to end the silence and stigma around perinatal mood and anxiety disorders. We want women to feel supported as new moms and not alone navigating their journey through motherhood.
We are committed to donating this program to organizations across Canada and the U.S. who have clients that might benefit from Birth Your Power ™. 
DID YOU KNOW?

 80% of Women Experience Postpartum Blues
 3-5% of Women Experience Postpartum Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder
 1 / 7 Women Experience Postpartum Depression

* If women do seek help, there are limited resources available to support them. They are often faced with waitlists, financial barriers, or additional obstacles to access the help they need.
* Women suffering from postpartum mental health disorders often don't want to leave the house and interact with others, therefore this program is 100% online. What We Need & What You Get:
* We need to build a website and online tools that new moms will find easy to navigate. 
* We need to film and edit the 12-Step Program with industry experts. 
* We need an Educational Fund to Raise Awareness around Birth Your Power ™.* For every donation, you will get our 12-Step Birth Your Power™ Program. You can keep it for yourself, or gift it to a mom in need. 
* Every person that donates has the option to email us a photo of themselves to go on the new website, under "Community / Supporters ."
* If you donate more than $75, we will give you a shout out on our @moga_moms and @birthyourpower Instagram stories. The Impact:

Destigmatize postpartum mental health. 
Help moms feel like herself again, regain strength, energy, joy and hope. 

Help us launch Birth Your Power™  by January 2019! 
In gratitude, 
Hannah & AmyOther Ways You Can Help:
If you are unable to contribute, please share our campaign. It reminds moms that they are not alone.

story:
Men Have Lupus was started by Louis Obadal in 2014 when he was diagnosed, and felt alone. His wife, Heather (me), has ran it as Lupus has destroyed his body and mind. Lou is one of those that couldn't maintain remission even with meds.

Archaic science and medical stigma have lead to a fictitious belief that only 10% of men between 18-59 have Lupus, yet the number is 50% outside of that age gap. Due to this stigma, around 2 million men worldwide are lacking diagnosis and treatment. News reporter Charles Kuralt suffered horrifically until death. Like Kuralt, many men are dying without diagnosis while receiving it posthumously during their autopsy. This moust stop.

What we hope to do with this fundraiser is become fully operational while awaiting our 501c3. This includes testing men for Lupus, helping those struggling while waiting on disability since there is no national Lupus group that helps with meds, doctors, food, or transportation. We also will have a place the men can come to if homeless or overwhelmed that will include horse therapy. Lastly, we will start testing a thesis that Jerusalem has cracked partially.

We need you now. Around 3 million men need you. Any little bit helps is greatly appreciated and gets us one step closer.
